Kazem has been an owner of a store selling fish and chicken, fresh and grilled since 2010. He has a deep understanding of local consumer needs. His store is situated in a crowded area so there are a good number of customers passing by. 

He decided to apply for a $1200 loan to purchase grilled chicken machinery. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: To purchase machinery for making grilled chicken.

loans.name: Vahe

texts.en:
Vahe is 34 years old and was born in Yerevan. He graduated from the State Engineering University of Armenia, Machine Building Economy Department. After graduation he worked in a hothouse as an economist. Vahe is married and has a little daughter. Vahe’s wife is a manager in a travel agency. 

Eight years ago Vahe began his own business, which consists of producing adornment with precious metals. He rents a place in a jewelry trade market and works very hard to support his young family. 

Thanks to his first Kiva loan, Vahe was able to buy ring and earring templates, which have been helping him until now in his business. Now Vahe has many orders, and to fulfill those orders he needs a loan of $3,000 to buy gold and other necessary materials for his business.

loans.use: To buy gold and other necessary materials for his business.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 28 years old, married and has two children.

Hussein has been an owner of a store for cooking and rental kitchen utensils since 2007; he has more than five years experiences in this field and has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He decided to apply for a $3000 loan in order to make two tents for his store and to buy more materials. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: In order to make two tents for his store and to buy more materials.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, married and has two children. 

A. has had a barber shop since 1995. He has more than 15 years' experience and he has a deep understanding of local consumers and he has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.


He decided to apply for a $2000 loan to renovate and fix his shop’s ceiling, doors, and floor and to pay the annual rent. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: To renovate and fix his shop’s ceiling, doors, and floor and to pay the annual rent.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 21 years old, married and has one child.

Ali has been an owner of a shop for photocopying and mobiles since 2003. He has a deep understanding of local consumers and he has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.


He decided to apply for a $2000 loan to pay the annual rent and to make a digital ad. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: To pay the annual rent and to make a digital ad.

loans.name: Amir

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 22 years old, married and has two children.

Amir has been an owner of a workshop since 2008 where he sells and repairs auto electrical parts. He has a good experience in this field and a good reputation and he is becoming well known in his area.

He decided to apply for a $2400 loan in order purchase electric-car equipement and to add more inventories. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: In order to purchase an electric-car equipment and to add more inventories.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa is the treasurer of this group. She is 46 and married to a pensioner. Together they have raised a daughter who is 22 years old. She studies at the university, and at the same time she works in a sewing workshop. 

Nine years ago with an initial investment of 5,000 soms Larisa started to sell children's clothes and hosiery. At this time her business is running well. She purchased a container (used as a retail stall) and improved the family’s living conditions. 

Larisa applied for the loan because she needs additional financial funds to purchase school uniforms in order to increase the commodity turnover of her business. In the future she wants to build a house in Bishkek for her family.

--- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 
MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 
If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase school uniforms for trade.

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 27 years old, married and has two children.

Ammar has been the owner of a workshop since 2008, making and selling concrete blocks. He has a good experience in this field and he has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in his area.

He decided to apply for a $1200 loan in order to purchase a large generator. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase a large generator.

loans.name: Doris Maritza

texts.es: Doris Maritza, de 44 años es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en casa propia junto a sus dos hijas y su nieto de 2 años.Para Doris los días de trabajo comienzan muy temprano por la mañana, cuando junto a una amiga sale a los caseríos y centros poblados a vender ropa usada y a comprar frutas para surtir su puesto de venta de frutas que tiene en su casa. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es salir a los caseríos ya que ahí encuentra todo tipo de productos y de alguna manera de distrae al mismo tiempo que genera ingresos para su hogar. Lleva 12 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es tener que salir muy temprano ya que a veces es peligroso. Con el tiempo, espera poder empezar a vender ropa nueva que le traerán de la ciudad de Lima.Este es el sexto préstamo de Doris con MFP y se siente en la responsabilidad pagarlo a tiempo, ya que no desea causarle problemas a las demás socias del banco comunal, es donde es muy querida ya que junto a su madre son las que le ponen la alegría al grupo.Con los 1500 soles que solicito, comprará más frutas y ropa para poder seguir en el negocio.
texts.en: Doris Maritza is 44 years old and she is a simple and hardworking woman. She lives in a house of her own together with her two daughters and a 2-year old grandchild. Doris starts her work very early in the morning when she gets together with a friend. They set out into the communities and towns to sell used clothing and to buy fruit to stock the fruit stand she has in her home. What she most enjoys about her work is traveling to the different communities because there she can find all types of products which passes the time, and at the same time she also generates an income for her household. She has been in business for 12 years and the most difficult part about her work is having to set out very early in the morning which can be dangerous. In time she hopes to start selling new clothing that will be brought to her from Lima. This is Doris' sixth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she recognizes the responsibility of paying it back on time. She doesn't want to cause any problems to the other members of the communal bank. She is very well liked in her community bank especially because she and her mother are the ones who bring humor to the group. With the 1500 nuevos soles she requested she will purchase more fruits and clothing to keep up her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and clothing to keep up her business.

loans.name: Vahram

texts.en:
Vahram is 54 years old, and he lives in Tsovagyugh village in the Sevan area with his family, which consists of his wife and his son. Vahram also has two daughters who are already married, and they live separately from their parents. 

After secondary school graduation, Vahram studied at vocational and training school. From 1976 to 1980 Vahram was working at different boarding houses as a baker, and then until 1990 he worked at the Tsovagyugh village mechanized bakery. 

Since 1992 Vahram has been engaging in animal breeding and land cultivation. As farming is the only source of revenue for Vahram’s family, Vahram’s wife and son also work at the farm. Thanks to their joint efforts they breed cows, sheep, pigs and chickens, and grow potatoes as well. 

Vahram intends to develop his farm, so he is asking for a 600.000 AMD loan, which he will use for buying three calves and fodder.

loans.use: to buy three calves and fodder.

loans.name: Buud Nooma Group

texts.fr:
Mme Félicité représente le groupe BUUD NOOMA. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 5ans et le moins âgé a 2ans. Un (1) va à l’école et elle a 03 personnes en charge.

Elle vend des pagnes, des prêts à porter depuis 06ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10.Ses clients sont les femmes.

Mme veut s’acheter 05 complets pagnes et 10 complets prêt à porter.

Elle épargne ses économies et ambitionne agrandir sa boutique et aussi s’occuper de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. Félicité is the leader of the group BUUD NOOMA. She is married and has two children. The older child is 5 and the younger is 2 years old. One child attends school and she is responsible for three people.

She has been selling fabric skirts and ready-to-wear clothes for six years. She buys her inventory at the market in sector 10. Her clients are women.

She wants to purchase five fabric skirts and 10 sets of ready-to-wear clothing.

She plans to save her money to expand her shop and to take care of her children.

loans.use: to purchase five fabric skirts and 10 sets of ready-to-wear clothing

loans.name: Kalondu

texts.en:
Kalondu is 81 years old. She is a charcoal seller and earns a monthly profit of about KES10,000 from her business. She has been loaned KES10,000 from KADET LTD, with which she plans to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

She will use the anticipated profit to improve her living standards. In the near future she hopes to have a well established business so that she can live a full life in her old age.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia is 32 years old and married to David. They are blessed with three school-going children. She has been a vegetable vendor for two years and gets a monthly profit of about KES 7,000. She has been loaned KES 20,000 which she plans to use to purchase more vegetables for resale.

With the anticipated profit she plans to expand her business, and in the near future she hopes to set up a grocery shop.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, (62 años) es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora. Vive en casa propia junto a su último hijo quien ya es mayor y su esposo. Ella trabaja duro porque desea tener una mejor calidad de vida. Mercedes es dueña de una bodega que esta ubicada en su casa, donde también vende bebidas heladas. Ella tiene muchos clientes ya que en la cuadra donde vive no hay más bodegas además ella procura que sus clientes se vayan contentos después de hacer sus compras y vuelvan muy a menudo. Lleva ya en este negocio 24 años y cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo y su hijo quienes generan ingresos adicionales con los diferentes trabajos que realizan. Le agrada su trabajo por que esta en contacto con la gente y así no esta sola cuando su esposo e hijo salen a trabajar, además su trabajo le genera buenos ingresos. Este es el préstamo séptimo que le otorga la entidad MFP, se siente muy feliz por haberlo obtenido y espera poder pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy querida por la alegría que pone en el grupo. Con los 3000 soles solicitados, comprará más bebidas e implementara aun más el almacén de su bodega.
texts.en: Mercedes is 62 years old and she is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She lives in a house of her own together with her youngest son, who is of age, and her husband. She works hard to have a better quality of life. Mercedes is the owner of a grocery store installed in her house. She also sells cold drinks. She has many clients because in the block where she lives there are no other convenience stores and she also makes sure that her clients leave happy with their purchases and to make them return very often. She has been in business for 24 years and she gets help from her husband and her son. They generate additional incomes from the different businesses they carry out. She enjoys her work for the contact she has with the people and therefore she is not alone when her husband and son go out to work. Her business also generates a good profit. This is the seventh loan granted to her by MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is very happy to have received it. She expects to make all of her payments on time. She is very well liked within her communal bank for the humor she brings to the group. With the 3000 nuevos soles she requested she will purchase more drinks and she will stock her inventory for the grocery store.

loans.use: purchase more drinks and she will stock her inventory for the grocery store.

loans.name: Batélé Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Batélé existe depuis l'ouverture du BV et ses membres habitent le même village. Le nom du groupe signifie "entente" en langue locale. L'activité principale est la culture et le commerce de légumes.
Mme Reine est âgée de 33 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Elle se situe à droite de la photo avec la main gauche levée. 
Elle pratique ces activités depuis son jeune âge et elle a acquis beaucoup d'expériences dans ce domaine.
Avec ce prêt, Mme Reine va renforcer sa capacité de production avec des semences de qualité et des insecticides pour s'assurer une bonne récolte.
Les profits tirés vont lui servir d'épargne, mais également elle compte appuyer son mari pour les besoins familiaux.
texts.en:
Batélé Group has existed since the opening of its Banc Villageois. Its name means "harmony" in the local language. The group members live in the same village. Their main activity consists in growing and selling vegetables.

Mrs Reine is 33 years old, married and the mother of four children. She is standing at the right-hand side of the photo with her left hand raised. She has worked as a farmer since her youth and has gained a lot of experience in this activity.

Mrs Reine will use her loan to boost her production capacity. She will buy high-quality seeds and insecticides to secure herself a good harvest. She will partly save her profit, but also use it to support her husband with family expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 53 years old and married. They have a 10-year-old son. Grace has been selling secondhand clothing for three years, making a monthly profit of about KES 10,000. 

She has been loaned KES 20,000 which she plans to use to purchase clothes, socks, jackets, blouses, skirts, dresses, etc.

She will use the anticipated profit from the sales to support her child's education. She hopes to be financially stable in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase clothes, socks, jackets, blouses, skirts, dresses, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy maize, beans, and rice for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy another motorbike.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 22 years old and single. He has been selling old shoes and kitchenware for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 8,000, which he uses to cater to his basic needs.

He is applying for his first loan from KADET after being introduced by a KADET staff member. He will use the loan to add a stock of new shoes and more kitchenware to his business. 

With the anticipated profit from the two businesses, he will expand the business. His hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop and continue with his education up to university level.

loans.use: To add new shoes and more kitchenware to his business.

loans.name: Erastus

texts.en: Erastus is a determined 38-year-old businessman. He is married and blessed with two children. For the last four years, he has been selling second hand clothes to cater to his family needs. He supplements the income from this venture with the earnings he gets from farming. He wants in the next five years to have expanded his business and started a poultry business. He is requesting a loan of 80,000 Kenyan shillings to buy second hand clothes. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has been able to establish his business.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothes

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, de 41 años es padre de 3 niños. Vive con ellos en casa propia junto a su esposa y su madre quienes le ayudan en diferentes actividades y quienes quedan con los niños mientras el sale a trabajar.El trabajo de Francisco empieza muy temprano, cuando se dirige a un taller de soldadura que alquilo junto a otros compañeros de trabajo para poder realiza todo tipo de obras en carpintería metálica. Lleva siete años en este negocio y esta contento porque es algo que le gusta hacer. Considera que lo malo es el riesgo que corre pues el trabajo con soldadura en fierro y electricidad es un poco peligroso.Como buen padre siempre llega a la casa con algo en las manos porque con el dinero que gana espera poder seguir dándoles buena educación a sus hijos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Espera poder tener un taller propio y mantener la gran cartera de clientes que logro obtener durante sus siete años de experiencia laboral.Este es el sexto préstamo de Francisco con MFP y espera poder seguir junto a sus compañeros de grupo con quienes se lleva muy bien y es conocido como un hombre responsable en sus pagos.Con el préstamo el comprará materiales y fierros para seguir en su trabajo que hasta el momento le esta dando buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Francisco is 41 years old, and he has three children.  He lives with them in his own house together with his wife and mother.  They help him with different business activities.  They stay at home with the children while he goes to work.

Francisco’s work starts very early when he heads to a soldering shop that he rents together with other work colleagues.  He goes there to be able to do all types of metallic carpentry.  He has been in this business for seven years, and he is happy because it is something that he likes to do.  He feels that the bad part is the risk he runs.  Soldering with iron and electricity is a little dangerous.

As a good father, he always comes home with something in his hands.  He does this because he hopes to be able to continue giving his children a good education and improving his family’s quality of life.  He hopes to be able to have his own workshop and to keep the large customer base that he managed to get during his seven years of work experience.

This is Francisco’s sixth loan with MFP.  He hopes to be able to continue working together with his colleagues in the group.  He gets along very well with them, and he is known as a man who is responsible with his payments.  He will use the loan to buy materials and iron in order to continue with his work.  So far it has been giving him good income.

loans.use: to buy materials and iron in order to continue working.

loans.name: Leticia Del Carmen

texts.es: Leticia del Carmen de 54 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su madre, hija y compañero de vida. Leticia es una mujer ejemplar ya que es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y sobre todo amable. Desde hace mucho tiempo que se dedica a los negocios por lo que cuenta con mucha experiencia en este campo. Ella se dedica a la venta de bolsos y carteras de manera ambulante. Tiene mucha clientela y es muy conocida en la zona ya que para ella lo más importante son los clientes, por lo tanto siempre trata de ofrecer calidad, variedad y buenos precios en sus productos. Sueña con ver a sus familia en mejores condiciones y sabe que la única forma de lograrlo es trabajando duramente para ganarse el pan de cada día y poder aspirar a una calidad de vida diferente. Esto la ha motivado a solicitar  este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio y comprar variedad de bolsos y carteras con el fin de atraer a más clientes y cubrir una mayor demanda que le permitan aumentar sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos. Tiene plena confianza que de esta manera logrará su objetivo.
texts.en:
Leticia del Carmen, age 54, lives in her own house with her mother, her daughter, and her life partner.  Leticia is an exemplary woman because she is hard-working, enterprising, and above all, very kind.

She has been a businesswoman for a long time.  Therefore, she has a lot of experience in this field.  She sells purses and wallets in an itinerant manner.  She has a lot of customers, and she is well-known in the area.  This is because the most important thing to her is the customer.  Therefore, she always tries to offer quality, variety, and good prices for her products.

She dreams of seeing her family in better living conditions.  She knows that the only way to achieve this is by working hard in order to earn her daily bread.  She does this to be able to pursue a different life.

This has motivated her to request a loan from Integral.  The loan is to invest in her business.  She will buy a variety of purses and wallets in order to attract more customers.  With this investment she will cover a greater demand, which will allow her to increase her sales in order to increase her income.  She has every confidence that she will achieve her objective this way.

loans.use: to buy a variety of purses and wallets.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George, 35, is an honest, hardworking, and responsible businessman. He is married and blessed with two children who go to school. For the last three years, he has been making a living from engaging in the transport business. He wants in the next five years to have accumulated enough capital to open up other businesses. His dream is to expand his business and provide employment to others. He is requesting a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to repair his motorbike. He is grateful to Faulu Kenya for empowering him economically and financially.

loans.use: to repair his motor bike

loans.name: Ana Margoth

texts.es: Ana Margoth D. 45 años D. edad, vive en casa familiar con su compañero D. vida y dos hijas. Ana se caracteriza por ser una mujer luchadora y entregada a su familia. DesD. hace muchos años que posee una pequeña tiendita en su hogar D. residencia y gracias a su dedicación y amabilidad en el mismo ha logrado mantenerlo activo y hasta el momento cuenta con mucha clientela gracias a su carisma y buena disposición a la hora D. atender a sus clientes. Su sueño es surtir su tienda  para cubrir una mayor demanda que le generen un aumento en sus ventas que le lleven a mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito para invertir en su tienda en la compra D. los principales artículos como: azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, golosinas, detergente, pan dulce, y muchos productos más que ayuden a atraer a más clientes que le permitan lograr su sueño.
texts.en:
Ana Margoth, age 45, lives in the family house with her life partner and her two daughters.  Ana is characterized as being a tenacious woman who is devoted to her family.

She has had a small store in her house for many years.  Thanks to her dedication and affability she has managed to keep the store active.  So far she has a lot of customers thanks to her charisma and willingness to tend to her customers.

Her dream is to stock her store in order to cover a greater demand that will be created by an increase in sales.  This will lead to a better quality of life for her and for her family.

She decided to request this loan in order to invest in her store by purchasing basic items such as sugar, rice, beans, oil, sweets, detergent, sweet rolls, and many more products that help attract more customers.  This will allow her to fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, beans, oil, sweets, detergent, and sweet rolls, etc.

loans.name: Theresiah

texts.en: Theresiah, 36, is a serious, hardworking, and committed business lady. She is single and blessed with a 10-year-old school-going child. For the last seven years, she has been operating a retail shop to make ends meet. Previously, she worked as an employee. She wants in the next five years to be operating her shop but now in wholesale terms. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy bread, soft drinks, and sugar. She is grateful to Faulu Kenya for making finances available to her.

loans.use: to buy bread, soft drinks, and sugar

loans.name: Ana Mabel

texts.es: Ana Mabel D. 50 años D. edad, habita en casa propia con su esposo D. 67 años D. edad el cual se dedica a la agricultura.  Ana ha trabajado toda su vida para ver a su familia en mejores condiciones  a las que ella y su querido esposo han tenido. Gracias a muchos sacrificios ha logrado sacar  adelante a su familia y ahora sus hijos ya se encuentran haciendo sus propios hogares.  Ella tiene un puesto frente al parque central D. la ciudad donD. ella habita, a orilla D. calle y sobre zona peatonal. Ella  se dedica a la venta D. sandalias para todas las edades, gustos y preferencias. Muchas personas la prefieren ya que se caracteriza por ser una mujer amable y dedicada a su trabajo. Además los clientes la prefieren porque siempre encuentran lo que buscan. Últimamente ha notado un aumento en sus ventas y como toda mujer emprendedora no quiere dejar ir esta oportunidad. Debido a lo anterior ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en variedad D. sandalias especialmente para mujeres ya que es la que más se venD.. Tiene plena confianza que los resultados serán benéficos y le permitirán aspirar a una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Ana Mabel is 50 years old and lives in her own house with her 67-year-old husband who is dedicated to agriculture. Ana has worked all her life in order to see her family enjoy better conditions than her dear husband had.

Thanks to her many sacrifices, Ana Mabel has been able to advance her family and now, her children are forming their own households. She has a stall in front of the central park in the city where she lives, alongsiD. the street in the pedestrian zone. Ana sells sandals for all ages, tastes, and preferences. Many people prefer her because she is characterized as a pleasant woman dedicated to her work. Moreover, customers come to her because they always find what they are looking for.

Lately, she has noted an increase in sales and like all enterprising women, she doesn't want to lose this opportunity. Due to this increased activity, she decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL to invest in a variety of sandals, especially for women, since that is what sells best.  Ana is confident that the results will be beneficial, permitting her family to aspire to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of sandals, especially for women, to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires and repair the seats

loans.name: Elmer Dagoberto

texts.es: Elmer Dagoberto de 42 años de edad, habita en casa familiar con su compañera de vida, cuñada y su hijo que por el momento se encuentra estudiando. Elmer se dedica a la venta de billetes de Lotería y Lotín en las principales áreas de la zona donde él Habita, va ambulante por colonias, parques y calles en busqueda de potenciales clientes. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad  por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el mundo de los negocios. Elmer es un hombre ingenioso que no pierde oportunidad para hacer negocio.  Últimamente ha sentido un aumento en la demanda de sus billetes de Lotería  por lo que ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mas billetes de Lotería y Lotín con el objetivo de cubrir una mayor demanda que le permitan mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer Dagoberto is 42 years old and lives in his family house with his life's companion and his sister-in-law, and his son who, at the moment, is still studying. Elmer sells lottery tickets in the principal areas of the zone where he lives, walking the neighborhoods, parks and streets, in search of potential customers. He has done this for many years and, consequently, has much experience in the business.

Elmer is a clever man who doesn't neglect opportunities to do business. Lately, he is experiencing  increased demand for his lottery tickets and has decided to solicit this loan through INTEGRAL to invest in additional lottery tickets. His objective is to capture more of that demand, which will permit him to improve his income as well as his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: buy additional lottery tickets to sell.

loans.name: Agustino

texts.en: Agustino is 49 years old, married to Caroline and together they have four school-going children. He has been running his hotel business for 12 years and he earns a monthly profit of KES 15,000. He has been loaned KES 30,000, which he plans to use to purchase a refrigerator. With the anticipated profit, he plans to expand his business and build a residential house. In the near future, he hopes to have completed his residential house and expanded his business.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 63 años, es una mujer sencilla y trabajadora, vive en casa propia junto a su hija y su nieto con quienes comparte su alegría y entusiasmo de poder salir adelante.Mercedes se dedica al comercio de frutas de temporada de la región, este trabajo lo realiza en su casa y cuando hay escasez de ventas lo hace en la esquina del mismo.  Ella también  se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y se va por el río en busca de generar un ingreso mas para su hogar. Lo que mas le gusta de trabajar en esta actividad es que puede disponer de su tiempo ya que sus ventas las realiza en el horario que ella crea conveniente. Lleva 4 años en esta actividad y siente que le va bien ya que sus ganancias son duplicadas dependiendo de su inversión. Mercedes espera poder ampliar su negocio y dedicarse a la venta de comida en la vereda de su casa ya que vio que hay un mercado muy interesante en la calle en la que vive. Mercedes lleva ya el sexto préstamo con MFP espera poder seguir bien como le ha ido hasta ahora ya que siempre se mostró como una mujer responsable y sobre todo cumplida, en su banco comunal es una socia muy querida ya que siempre esta con una sonrrisa y preocupándose por el bienestar de las demás socias.	Con los 1000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará frutas, ropa usada, ingrediente e insumos para la venta de comida y así poder emprender este nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Mercedes, aged 63, is a humble and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home with her daughter and grandson, with whom she shares her joy for living and enthusiasm to get ahead in life. Mercedes works selling seasonal fruits from the region.  She does this work from home, and when sales are slow, she does the same on the street corner.  She also sells used clothes and travels along the river to find more income for her household. 

What she likes most about working in this activity is that she can manage her own time as sales take place on her own schedule.   She has been engaged in this activity for 4 years, and feels that it's going well for her because her earnings are doubling her investment.  Mercedes hopes to expand her business and engage in selling food on the street in front of her home, as she saw there is a very interesting market in the street where she lives. 

Mercedes is taking her sixth loan through MFP, and expects to continue as well as she has done up until now.   She has always shown herself to be a responsible woman, and above all accomplished.   She is a beloved member of her community bank, who is always smiling and concerned with the welfare of the other members. 

With the 1,000 New Soles requested, she will buy fruit, second-hand clothing, and ingredients and supplies for the sale of food so she can start this new business.

loans.use: to buy fruit, second-hand clothing, and ingredients and supplies for selling food.

loans.name: Ana Gladys

texts.es: Ana Gladys de 53 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su compañero de vida Manuel de 74 años de edad el cual ya es un hombre pensionado. Ella posee una tortillería la cual atiende todos los días con mucha dedicación y amabilidad. El negocio de Ana se encuentra en una zona muy transitada y estratégica semiurbana ya que alrededor se encuentran muchos negocios que son sus principales clientes. Además de la venta de tortillas, todas las tarde se dedica a la venta de ricas pupusas. Ana es una mujer ejemplar que no se cansa de trabajar a pesar de su avanzada edad. Ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tortillería que es el negocio más fuerte que tiene. El crédito lo necesita para invertir en la compra de: maíz, leña, agua, gas propano, etc. De esta manera espera mejorar sus ventas, su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Gladys is 53 years old.  She lives in her own home with her life partner Manuel, who's 74 years old and a pensioner.  

She has a tortilla business that she attends to every day with dedication and kindness.  Ana's business is located strategically in a very busy,semi-urban area, where she is surrounded by many businesses that are her main customers.  In addition to selling tortillas, she sells rich pupusas (stuffed tortillas) every evening.

Ana is an exemplary woman who never tires of working despite her advanced age.  She has decided to apply for this loan through INTEGRAL to invest in her tortilla business, so the business will become stronger.  She needs the loan to invest in the purchase of corn, wood, water, propane, etc.  In this way she hopes to improve her sales, her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood, water, propane, etc.

loans.name: Edilda

texts.es: Edilda D. 40 años D. edad, habita en su casa con su esposo José D. 47 años y sus tres hijos que se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica  al comercio desD. hace mucho tiempo. Posee un puesto en el Mercado Central D. la zona donD. ella habita en el cual venD. variedad D. prendas D. vestir. Este negocio es su principal fuente D. ingresos  por lo que desea mantenerlo activo por mucho tiempo para poder dar a sus hijos el estudio y poder verlos como grandes profesionales. Edilda se caracteriza por ser una mujer luchadora, trabajadora y entregada en su trabajo. Gracias a esto muchas personas la prefieren ya que ella siempre  se preocupa por tener variedad D. prendas D. vestir para que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan. Además ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y esta es la razón por la que día con día  trabaja duramente para darles lo que necesitan. Como toda mujer emprendedora ha decidido ampliar su negocio surtiéndolo con variedad D. prendas D. vestir para que los clientes la sigan prefiriendo y pueda seguir recibiendo los frutos D. su negocio.  Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad D. prendas D. vestir como: blusas, faldas, vestidos, ropa interior, camisetas, pantalones, etc. Tiene plena confianza que D. esta manera logrará mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en:
Edilda is 40 years old, and shares her home with her ​​husband José, aged 47, and their three school-age children.  She has worked in traD. for a long time.  She has a stand in the Central Market of the area where she lives, where she sells a variety of clothing. This business is her main source of income, so she wants to keep it active for a long time so as to be able to give her children an education and to see them become successful professionals. 

Edilda is known as a fighter, a hardworking woman who is dedicated to her work.  Thanks to this, many people prefer to shop with her, and she is always concerned about having a variety of clothes, so that her customers can always find what they're looking for.  She also offers quality and good prices for her products. 

For her, the most important thing is her family, and this is why she works hard every day to proviD. for them.  As with any enterprising woman, she has decided to expand her business by stocking a variety of clothing for the customers who continue to prefer coming to her, and so she can continue to receive the fruits of her business.  It is for this reason that she is requesting this loan through INTEGRAL, to buy a variety of clothing such as blouses, skirts, dresses, underwear, shirts, pants, etc.  She is confident that in this way she will achieve a better quality of life for herself and for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing such as blouses, skirts, dresses, underwear, shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Guadalupe

texts.es: Rosa Guadalupe D. cincuenta y seis años D. edad vive con sus nietos. Ella posee una pupuseria en el lugar D. su residencia es muy famosa en la localidad pues las pupusas que prepara tienen un sabor exquisito e inigualable y el acompañamiento del delicioso curtido a base D. fermento D. piña y la rica secreta receta D. salsa D. tomate son el complemento idoneo D. sus pupusas. Se ha hecho D. mucha clientela pues les da una buen servicio y precios cómodos; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora con ganas D. salir adelante  para ella las personas que trabajan duro y le ponen amor a su labor son las que consiguen el éxito, es por eso que ella le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima como maíz, arroz, queso, chicharrón, frijoles, entre otros para mantener a flote el negocio. Rosa Guadalupe tiene fe que su esfuerzo le dará la oportunidad D. darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Rosa Guadalupe is fifty-six years old and lives with her grandchildren.  She has a pupusa (stuffed tortilla) business in her home, which is famous in the neighborhood as the pupusas she makes have an exquisite and incomparable taste, and the accompaniment of delicious cabbage salad on a base of fermented pineapple, and the rich tomato sauce maD. from a secret recipe, are the perfect complement for her pupusas.  She has a large clientele, as she gives them good service and affordable prices.

Rosa is an enterprising woman with a desire to get ahead in life.  As far as she's concerned, people who work hard and love the work they do, are those that achieve success.  This is why she is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL, which will allow her to buy raw ingredients such as corn, rice, cheese, pork, beans, and other things to keep her business afloat. 

Rosa Guadalupe has faith that her efforts will proviD. her the opportunity to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, cheese, pork, and beans.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David, a hardworking 38-year-old businessman, is married and blessed with two children who attend school. Previously a charcoal-seller, he now offers video-shooting services to make a living. Within the next five years, David wants to double his business volume, and his dream is to transform his business into a firm.

Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has been able to develop his business, and is now requesting a loan of 11500 Kenya shillings to buy a solar lamp.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Marta Luz

texts.es: Marta Luz de treinta y ocho años de edad posee una tienda en su residencia, es la más surtida de productos de buena calidad en la zona; ella se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan a precios bajos y con un servicio excelente. Marta es una mujer muy activa se levanta desde muy temprano a trabajar  ya que  su lema es al que madruga Dios le ayuda, siempre está adelante de la competencia y necesita surtirse de nuevos productos es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar golosinas, granos básicos, bebidas, embutidos, pan, productos instantáneos entre otros así siempre satisfacera el gusto del cliente. Marta Luz tiene la confianza que con su trabajo lograra darle a su familia una vida plena
texts.en:
Marta Luz is 38 years old, and operates a store in her home. It has the best selection of good quality products in the area. She has a lot of customers because she always has what people need, at low prices and with excellent service. Marta is a very energetic woman. She gets up very early to work, since her motto is, "God helps the one who gets up early".  

She is always ahead of her competition and needs to stock up with new products. That's why she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy candy, basic grains, beverages, sausages, bread, instant products, and other things. In this way she will always satisfy the tastes of the customer.  Marta Luz is confident that with her work she will succeed in giving her family a full life.

loans.use: candy, basic grains, beverages, sausages, bread, instant products

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a focused 42-year-old businessman. He is married and blessed with two children who are go to school. He has been operating a butcher shop for the last two years to provide for his family. He makes an extra coin by cultivating crops and dairy farming. Previously, he used to make a living from the transport sector. 

He is requesting a loan of 9,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a solar lamp. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he is now financially empowered and is able to make critical decisions.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is an optimistic 35-year-old business lady. She is married and blessed with two children who are going to school. She has been offering hotel services for the last two years to meet the needs of her family. She makes an extra shilling by selling groceries. Previously, she used to run a retail shop. She wants in the next five years to be able to meet her clients' needs comfortably.

She is requesting a loan of 9,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a solar lamp. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her financial status.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de cuarenta y ocho años de edad, tiene una pupuseria en su residencia, su estrategia ha sido instalarse a orilla de calle y permitir que sus clientes que desean comer en el lugar ingresen dentro de su casa en donde la adecuó para que coman como en casa. Es muy visitada por las personas del lugar pues la prefieren porque vende unas pupusas exquisitas y también unos tamales deliciosos, da un buen servicio, el lugar es muy higiénico y además tiene precios accesibles. Ella es muy carismática y trabajadora siempre recibe a su clientela con una sonrisa en el rostro, para ella la alegría en el trabajo y la dedicación es la clave del éxito, quiere que su negocio crezca por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima como harina, frijoles, queso, chicharrón, pollo entre otros así siempre estará al frente de la competencia. María del Carmen tiene la confianza que su esfuerzo le permitirá llevar al hogar seguridad económica
texts.en:
María del Carmen, who is forty-eight years old, sells stuffed tortillas from her home. Her strategy has been to set herself up at the edge of the street and allow customers who want to eat there to go into her house, where they feel like they are eating at home. 

She is frequented by many locals, who prefer her exquisite tortillas and delicious tamales. They receive good service, the place is very clean and the prices are affordable. She is very charismatic and hardworking, and always welcomes her customers with a smile on her face. To her, being happy and dedicated to her work are the keys to success. 

She would like her business to grow, so she is requesting a loan from Kiva Field Partner, Apoyo Integral. This would allow her to purchase basic ingredients such as flour, beans, cheese, pork, chicken and more. That way, she will always be ahead of the competition. María del Carmen is confident that her efforts will allow her to provide economic security at home.

loans.use: to purchase flour, beans, cheese, pork, chicken and more.

loans.name: Ekali

texts.en: Ekali is 32 years old. He is married and blessed with four children who are going to school. For the last two years, he has been engaging in the transport business to make a living. He makes an extra shilling by engaging in farming. He wants in the next five years to be self-reliant and to be able to run his business comfortably. He is requesting a loan of 9,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a solar lamp. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his financial status.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stocks of shoes.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana Ruth D. cuarenta y cuatro años D. edad vive con su hijo en casa propia. Ella posee una venta D. ropa nueva y usada D. muy buena calidad; ya posee muchos clientes pues la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos necesitan, ropa D. niños, D. dama y caballero en estilos novedosos, les ofrece un servicio excelente y precios realmente accesibles; pero Ana es una mujer que piensa en granD. y quiere ampliar el comercio D. su ropa es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, blusas, camisetas entre otros así creerá el negocio y satisfacera a la clientela. Ana Ruth tiene la confianza que D. esta forma lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Ana Ruth is forty-four years old and she lives with her son in a house that she owns. She has a new and high-quality used clothing business. She has many clients who prefer her because she always has what they need, including children's, ladies, and gentlemen's clothing in the latest fashions. She offers excellent service and very accessible prices. But Ana is a woman who looks at the bigger picture and she wants to increase her clothing business. For this reason she requests a loan from Integral (Kiva Field Partner) that will let her purchase skirts, pants, undergarments, blouses, t-shirts and others. This will stimulate business and it will satisfy her clientele. Ana Ruth believes that this is how she will be able to proviD. her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase skirts, pants, undergarments, blouses, and t-shirts.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.es: Vivian es una mujer activa de 34 años que vive en una casa alquilada junto con sus 3 menores hijos y su esposo quien trabaja en una compañía de la región.El negocio de Vivian consiste en traer ropa de Lima para poder venderla entre sus amigos y familiares porque ella tiene un buen mercado. Realiza esta actividad sola desde hace 2 años. Le gusta mucho trabajar de esta manera ya que así puede tener tiempo disponible para poder estar junto a sus hijos. Además, tiene contacto con muchas personas y así poder agrandar su negocio. Lo que no le gusta es que a veces las personas se aprovechan de su amabilidad y le hacen esperar mucho tiempo para poder pagarle pero ella es una mujer paciente y porque sabe que al final siempre le terminan pagando.Vivian quiere poner en el futuro una tienda de ropa, abarrotes, adornos y otras novedades más que en la región no hay mucho y que tiene mucha salida entre los clientes.Este es el segundo préstamo que le otorga la institución MFP y tiene muchas expectativas ya que hasta ahora el grupo en el que esta son muy amables y sobre todo unidos.Con los 1000 soles solicitados, comprará ropa de la ciudad de Lima, para poder incrementar su stock.
texts.en: Vivian is an active 34-year old woman who lives in a rental house together with her 3 young children and her house. He is employed by a company in the region. Vivian's business consists of bringing clothing form Lima to resell among her friends and families. She has been managing her business on her own for the past 2 years. She really enjoys working this way because she is able to have spare time to spend together with her children. She is also makes contact with many people and she has the opportunity to expand her business. What she does not like is that sometimes people take advantage of her kindness and they make her wait for a long time before paying. But she is a very patient woman and she knows that in the end the will pay in full. In the future Vivian wants to set up a store from where to sell clothing, groceries, decorations, and products that are not frequently found in the region, something that is highly requested among her clients. This is the second loan that MFP (Kiva Field Partner) grants her and she has high expectations because the other members of the group are very kind and they are very close. With the 1000 nuevos soles requested she will purchase clothing in the city of Lima to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to supplement her inventory.

loans.name: Luka

texts.en: Luka is an ambitious 41-year-old businessman. He is married and blessed with a seven-year-old child. To provide for his family, for the last two years he has been operating a barber shop. Previously, he used to engage in cattle farming. He wants in the next five years to have excelled in his business and his dream is to be financially stable. He is requesting a loan of 9,000 Kenya shillings to buy a solar lamp. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he is now able to make critical decisions.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Rubén Edgardo

texts.es: Rubén Edgardo de treinta y siete años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una panadería muy conocida en la localidad donde residen porque venden el pan más exquisito y a los mejores precios, el tiene muchos años de ser un artesano del pan, como él mismo se llama; además Rubén les da el mejor servicio, siempre está a la orden del cliente; él es un hombre lleno de metas por alcanzar y una de ellas es ver crecer su negocio él piensa que aquel que ama a su trabajo también se ama a sí mismo  y sus sueños es por eso que muy decidido le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima como harina, levadura, azúcar, bandejas entre otros. Rubén Edgardo tiene la esperanza que su humilde trabajo le permitirá darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en: Ruben Edgardo is thirty-six years old and he lives with his life-partner and their children. He has a well-known bakery in the community where he lives. He sells the most exquisite breads and at the best prices. He has been a bread artisan for many years, matching his name. Ruben also provides the best service and he is always ready to serve his clients. His is a man who has many goals to attain and one of them is to see his business grow. He thinks that those who love their work also love themselves and their dreams. It is the reason why he has requested a loan from Integral (Kiva Field Partner) to purchase ingredients such as flour, yeast, sugar, baking trays, etc. Ruben Edgardo hopes that his humble work will permit him to provide his family with financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, sugar, and baking trays.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is 35 years old. He is a widower who has two children. One of the children is in school. To make a living, he operates a grocery shop to meet the needs of his family. He previously used to operate a retail shop. He wants in the next five years to improve the quantity and the portfolio that his shop handles so that he is able to realize his dream of being a prosperous businessman. He is requesting a loan of 9,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a solar lamp. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he is now able to access finances to use in his business.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a 36-year-old man, married with four children and one dependant. His family is made up of six members. Richard lives in a rented house, his dream is to buy land and build his own business premises. Richard operates a retail shop in Bwijanga Masindi district. He has been in the business for six years. He started the business with only 200,000 as start up capital and now has over 2,000.000 UGX as stock. Richard has hardships like lack of enough capital to keep the business well stocked and the high costs of transporting his merchandise from town. Richard sees his business in his own premises and dealing in wholesale. The purpose of the business is to buy more shop items like detergents, tea leaves, sweets, curry powder, books, pens, pencils, plates, sugar, salt and polythen paper bags.

loans.use: To buy more shop items like detergents, tea leaves, sweets, curry powder, books, pens, pencils. plates, sugar, salt and paper bags

loans.name: Jocinta

texts.en:
Jocinta is 37 years old and single with two children. She is a dressmaker and has been in the business for four years, making a monthly profit of KES 7,000. She has been loaned KES 20,000. She plans to purchase more pieces of cloth to use in her business.

With the anticipated profit, she hopes to educate her children to higher levels of education. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth

loans.name: Arellys

texts.es:
En municipio de Managua, la señora Arellys se dedica arduamente  a laborar como Jefe de despacho en una institución del estado, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace tres años. Es soltera y con una personas a su cargo que le proporciona las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrollen a un nivel de vida mejor.

La señora Arellys ha acudido a ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para mejorar la condición de vida, este credito lo va a invertir  en pago de posgrado para preparacion profesional de ella.
texts.en:
In the city of Managua, Arellys works very hard as an office manager in a state institution.  She has been doing this work for 3 years.  She is single and has one dependent to whom she must provide the conditions needed so that they can develop and have a better life.

Arellys has come to CEPRODEL to request a loan so that she can raise her standard of living.  She will invest this loan in paying for graduate studies for her professional development.

loans.use: to pay for her educational expenses

loans.name: Rubia Antonia

texts.es: Rubia Antonia de 60 años de edad, reside en su casa con su esposo Crisanto de 66 años de edad. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura en el área del cultivo de caña de azúcar y maíz. Mientrás que Rubia posee una tienda y además un molino de nixtamal en el cual muele todo tipo de granos, este es su principal fuente de ingresos ya que los frutos de la agricultura a los que se dedica su esposo se perciben al final de cada año. La ubicación del negocio es muy estratégica ya que se encuentra ubicado frente a la Plaza Central del lugar donde ella reside, además es el único molino que existe en la zona por lo que no posee competencia alguna. Actualmente la capacidad del molino no dá abasto a toda la demanda que tiene y se ha visto en la necesidad de comprar otro con mayor capacidad con que logre cubrirla y tener satisfechos a todos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita a INTEGRAL este crédito para comprar un molino de nixtamal con mayor capacidad al que ya posee. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta manera podrá mejorar los ingresos familiares y consecuentemente la calidad de sus vidas
texts.en: Rubia Antonia, 60, lives in her house with her husband Crisanto, who is 66 years old.  Her husband is a farmer who cultivates sugar cane and corn.  Meanwhile, Rubia has a store and also a corn mill where she grinds all types of grains.  This is her main source of income, since her husband's income from farming comes at the end of every year.  Rubia's business is strategically located, since it is in front of the Central Plaza in her town.  In addition, hers is the only mill in the area, so she doesn't have any competition.  At this time the capacity of the mill is not sufficient to meet all of her demand, so she has seen the need to buy another mill with greater capacity so that she can satisfy all of the demands of her customers.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy a corn mill that has a greater capacity than the one she has.  She trusts in God and in her work that in this way she will be able to improve her family's income and consequently their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a corn mill with greater capacity

loans.name: Elsa Emerita

texts.es: Elsa Emérita tiene 55 años, sus propósitos son superarse en la vida para salir adelante ya que es lo que mas importante para seguir generando a su familia el sustento diario. Su actividad económica es la compra de mercadería en general, por lo que tiene que levantarse temprano para alistarse y abrir su negocio que está ubicado en las afueras del mercado. Hace más de  3 años, inicia este negocio por la necesidad de buscar un medio de ingreso, pues a su edad es muy difícil encontrar empleo. El financiamiento es para la compra de toallas, ropa en general, calzado, bolsos y cosméticos.
texts.en: Elsa Emerita is 55 years old.  Her goals are to do well in life and get ahead, since what is most important is to continue to make a living to support her family. She has a business selling merchandise; to do this she gets up very early to go out and open her business, which is located on the outskirts of the market.  She started this business more than 3 years ago because she needed a source of income, and at her age it is difficult to find work.  This loan will help her to buy towels, clothing, shoes, purses and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy towels, clothing, shoes, purses and cosmetics

loans.name: Abass

texts.en:
Abass is 30 years old and married with two children, ages two and seven. He runs a general merchandise store in Waterloo near Freetown.

Abass has owned this business for four years and sells onions, rice and bags of pepper at his store.  His business is the only source of income he has. He says that the main challenge to his business is price inflation.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more food items. Abass says that the extra income from this loan will help him increase his savings. In the future, he would like to be a supplier to other partners.

loans.use: To purchases more food items such as onions, rice, and bags of pepper.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his house

loans.name: Segundo Manongo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 53 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijos, el cual tiene los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona la actividad principal es la agricultura, ganadería y turismo (tiene festividades religiosas y lugares muy bonitos).

Segundo desde hace 8 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (pavos y gallinas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales; para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento ideal y poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtener muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más variedad de aves de corral y su respectivo alimento, con la finalidad de obtener un mejor precio con sus clientes y así mejorar  el nivel de vida de su familia. Segundo es una padre trabajador, empeñoso y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su negocio crezca para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo is 53 years old living in his own house with his wife and children.  The house has electricity and running water and is located in the urban part of Olmos District which belongs to Lambayeque Department.   This area’s main activities are farming, livestock raising and tourism (it has religious festivals and very pretty places).

Segundo has been raising barnyard fowl (turkeys and chickens) for the last 8 years.  His corral is located in his back yard.  He feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and natural grains so that his animals will have ideal growth and he will be able to sell them in the various local markets and earn good profits to meet his household expenses.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy more variety of fowl and their respective feed with the aim in mind of getting better prices from his customers and thereby improve his family’s standard of living.  Segundo is a hardworking, dedicated father who is very responsible and all he wants is that his business succeeds in order to move his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy more barnyard fowl and their respective feed.

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.en: Maria Jesus is 51 years old and separated from her husband. She has two children who are 19 and 22 years old and both live with her while they attend the University of Andina Cusco. She is a teacher at a local school for small children. In addition, she is also the owner of a small grocery store in which she sells basic snacks, soft drinks, beer, and other basic necessities. She is asking for a $500 loan in order to buy merchandise for her grocery store such as drinks, rice, pasta, and milk. Maria Jesus is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy drinks, rice, pasta, and milk for her gorcery store

loans.name: Angel Pablo

texts.es:
Angel de 58 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hija en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del departamento de Lambayeque.  Zona que desarrolla la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismos (cuenta con varios sitios arqueológicos).

La actividad que desempeña  Angel es como chófer de una empresa de transporte público, teniendo la ruta Chiclayo – Lambayeque y viceversas, con una experiencia de 8 años y todos los días realiza el mismo recorrido, los ingresos que adquiere le ayudará para brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1700 nuevos soles para  invertirlo en los estudios superiores que va realizar su hija, lo que le permitirá en un futuro alcanzar sus metas y poder ayudar a sus padres económicamente.  Angel es un padre responsable y preocupado, que lo único que desea es que su familia se supere.
texts.en:
Ángel, 58, lives with his wife and daughter in his own house which has running water and electricity and is located in an urban part of Lambayeque Department and is an area of farming, livestock raising and tourism (it has several archaeological sites).

Ángel is employed as a Driver at a public transportation firm on the Chiclayo-Lambayeque round trip route.  He has 8 years’ experience and every day he travels the same route.  Income he earns will help him provide his family with a better quality of life.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1700 new sol loan to invest in his daughter’s higher education which will permit her to reach her future goals and then be able to help her out her parents economically.  Ángel is a responsible, concerned father whose only desire is that his family progresses.

loans.use: to invest in his daughter's higher education.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 44 years old and is married to Jacinta. They have two children.  Charles has been running his retail shop for the last four years, making a monthly profit of KES.10,000. He has been loaned KES.20,000, with which he plans to purchase stock like flour, sugar, tea leaves, soaps, etc.

With the anticipated profit he plans to invest in the business, and in the near future he hopes to own his own wholesale operation.

loans.use: to purchase stock like flour, sugar, tea leaves, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Mercidia

texts.es: La señora Mercidia tiene 60 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva. Lo que la afecta es que no tiene mucho capital de trabajo para invertir más. Uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido su enfermedad que muchas veces no le permite salir a ofrecer sus productos. En su negocio no tiene mucha competencia ya que las ventas se hacen de forma ambulante. Desea continuar creciendo en su negocio y con la ayuda de financiamiento continuara invirtiendo. El financiamiento es para la compra de pantalones camisas, faldas, camisetas, trajes para niños y niñas y ropa de vestir.
texts.en: Mercidia, 60, sells new clothes.  What affects her is not having enough working capital to invest more.  One of her greatest challenges has been her illness which often keeps her from being able to go out to sell.  She doesn’t have much competition in her business because she’s a street vendor.  She wants to continue to grow in business and with help from the loan she’ll continue to invest in it.  The loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, t-shirts, outfits for boys and girls and dress clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es: Rosa Lidia, tiene 47 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos y reside en el Municipio de Culmi. Desde muy pequeña de edad Rosa se vio involucrada en el cultivo de Cafe ya que sus padres se dedicaban a esta actividad para poder sostener a la familia. Ahora Rosa tiene su propio cultivo de Cafe, inicio con una manzana de tierra cultivada pero actualmente cuenta con cuatro manzanas. Su esposo y sus hijos le ayudan con el trabajo de la finca. Su principal ventaja es que la zona donde esta ubicada su finca es muy apta para el cultivo y el producto se da muy bien. Aunque uno de sus problemas es que la calle para sacar la produccion al mercado esta muy deteriorada y eso le ocasiona perdidas de tiempo y hasta de clientes. El prestamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar abono y tambien para comprar materiales para construir un pequeño vivero. Con la ayuda del prestamo podra darle un mejor mantenimiento a las plantas de Cafe y de esa manera obtendra una produccion de mayor calidad. Su meta es llegar a tener diez manzanad de tierra sembradas con Cafe y que sus ingresos economicos mejoren para que ella y su familia tengan una mejor vida. Es el primer prestamo que solicita y espera cumplir con sus pagos de manera puntual para poder obtener otros mas adelante.
texts.en:
Rosa Linda, 47, is married and has four children; she lives in the town of Culmi.  Since childhood Rosa has been involved in farming coffee since her parents were in this occupation to support the family.  Now Rosa has her own coffee plantation that she started with a single manzana (Central American measure of land area) and now has a total of four manzanas.  Her husband and children help her with the farm chores.  Her main advantage is that the zone where her farm is located is very apt for farming and the product grows very well but one of the problems she faces is that the road that’s used to take the crops to market is very deteriorated and this causes losses of time and even of customers.

The loan she’s requesting is to buy manure and also to buy supplies to build a small nursery.  With help from the loan she will be able to give her coffee plants better care and thus obtain a more abundant harvest.  Her goal is to reach ten manzanas of land planted with coffee and that her income improves so that she and her family will have better lives.  This is her first loan request and she expects to make her payments punctually so that she can obtain others later on.

loans.use: to buy manure and supplies.

loans.name: Ena Melania

texts.es:
Ena de 51 años es madre de familia, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Monsefú que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.    Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Ena se dedica a la venta de ropa, negocio que a colocado en su domicilio desde hace 5 años, su mercadería lo ofrece a sus clientes, también trae a pedido, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ena is a 51 year old mother.  She lives with her family in her own house, which has all of the basic services.  It is located in an urban zone in the Monsefú district, which belongs to the Chiclayo province.  The zone is known for its agricultural, livestock, and handicraft activities.

Ena sells clothes.  She set up this business in her house five years ago.  She has merchandise to sell to her customers, and she also takes orders.  She is trying to have more customer demand.  That way she will have more income to pay for the family expenses.

Upon noticing that her business is thriving more each day, she believed that she needed to request a loan for 500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy a greater quantity of merchandise and to stock her store with innovative products.  She will do this so that the number of customers that she has continues to increase.  This is so that she will be able to pay her loan and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of merchandise to stock her business.

loans.name: Segundo Guilo

texts.es:
Segundo es un hombre de 40 años oriundo del cantón Latacunga en la provincia de Cotopaxi. Vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos. El reside en la parroquia Eloy Alfaro; el clima en el cantón es un poco frío ya que se encuentran a 2850 metros de altura sobre el nivel del mar. Es un cantón muy colorido y con muchas tradiciones, cada año son infaltables las celebraciones de la "Mama negra", "Baile de inocentes" y la "Fiesta de la Virgen de las Mercedes".


Un golpe duro y triste en la vida de Segundo fue la muerte de su madre ya que fue difícil de superarlo. Siempre se catalogó como un hombre frontal y trabajador, durante 20 años el trabajó en un taller de reparación de vehículos en donde aprendió sobre reparación de los mismos, hoy se dedica específicamente a dar servicio de pintura y enderezado de vehículos. Él necesita invertir en insumos para poder seguir dando este servicio, quiere comprar variedad de pintura para poder dar mejores opciones a su clientela. Para ello necesita un préstamo que le permita lograr su objetivo y así tener mayores ingresos y mejorar su vida.
texts.en:
Segundo is a 40-year old man who is originally from the canton of Latacunga in the province of Cotopaxi. He lives together with his wife and two children. He lives in the Parish of Eloy Alfaro. The climate of this canton is somewhat cool as it is located at an elevation of 2850 meters above sea level. It is a very colorful canton with many traditions. Occurring every year without fail are the celebrations of "Mama Negra" (meaning "Black Mama"), "Baile de Inocentes" (meaning "The Dance of the Innocents"), and "Fiesta de la Virgen de las Mercedes" (meaning "Feast of the Virgen of Mercedes). 

A hard and sad blow to Segundo's life was the death of his mother and it was difficult for him to overcome. He has always been known as a forward and hardworking person. For the past 20 years he worked in an auto repair shop and it is where he learned to repair cars. Today he provides paint and auto body repairs. He needs to invest the purchase of products to be able to keep providing service. He wants to purchase a variety of paints to offer his clientele wider options. He needs a loan to help him reach his objective, thereby improving his income and his life.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and paint for this auto body business.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Aminata is 32 years old and married with two children, ages 9 and 16. She runs a rice store in Grassfield, east of  Freetown. Her children currently attend school.

Aminata has owned this business for seven years and sells rice, tinned tomatoes, oil and sugar at her store. She also earns income from her business and house rental. She says that the main challenges to her business are the high prices of goods and the rainy season.

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more foodstuff such as rice, sugar, salt and oil. Aminata says that the extra income from this loan will help her educate her children. In the future, she plans to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuff such as bags of rice, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 55 years old and is married with three children, all of whom live separately from her. Her occupation is selling different types of bread in the local market of her city, Calca. Delia wakes up early each morning to make her bread fresh daily at a local place where she rents an oven. 

She is asking for a $1,200 loan mainly to help pay for the rent on her oven but also to buy ingredients such as wheat, flour, and sugar. Delia is a hardworking woman and is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for the rent on her oven and to buy ingredients such as wheat, flour, and sugar to make bread

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
María Esther de 40 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona es agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

María Esther se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, actividad que viene realizando junto con su esposo desde hace varios años, cuenta con un local donde vende el pan que prepara y también ofrece diversos dulces a sus clientes,  tiene su propia clientela, últimamente su negocio a ido creciendo y han aumentado sus clientes, lo que le permite tener mayores ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su casa.  También cría y vende aves de corral, una vez que se engorden las comercializa a sus clientes o en los diferentes mercados de la zona.

Para seguir realizando sus actividades como hasta el momento a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar insumos para seguir elaborando pan, realizar algunas mejoras al local donde funciona su panadería y comprar alimento para sus animales, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y tener un poco más de comodidades.  María Esther y su esposo han sabido salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, con la finalidad de alcanzar lo que se han propuesto.
texts.en:
María Esther, 40, lives with her husband in her own house which does not have basic utilities and is located in Mórrope District which belongs to Lambayeque Department.  This is a farming, livestock raising and crafts making zone.

María Esther makes bread to sell.  She’s been doing this for several years with her husband.  She has a locale where she sells the bread she makes and also sells various sweets to her customers.  She has her own clientele and lately the business has been growing and the number of customers has increased which leads to higher income to meet her daily household expenses.  She also raises barnyard fowl and once they fatten up she sells them to her customers or in the various local markets.

To continue carrying out her activities like she’s done to date, she feels it’s necessary to request a 2000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy ingredients to continue making bread and to do some improvements to the locale where her bakery operates as well as to buy feed for her animals.  With income she earns she will be able to repay the loan and have a few more comforts.

María Esther and her husband have learned how to get ahead through much effort and work in order to attain what they have proposed for themselves.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make bread and to make some improvements to the bakery.

loans.name: Jose Isaac

texts.es:
En municipio de Managua, el Jose Isaac se dedica   a laborar como agente de seguridad en una institución del estado, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace cuatro años. Es casado y con dos personas a su cargo que le proporciona las condiciones necesarias a su familia. 

El señor Jose Isaac ha acudido a ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito que lo utilizara para gasto de operacion de una hematoma en el hombro de su esposa.
texts.en:
Jose Isaac works as a security guard at a state institution in the Managua municipality.  He has been doing this for four years.

He is married, and he has two people under his care.  He provides his family with the necessary living conditions.

Jose Isaac has come to Ceprodel to request a loan.  He will use the loan to pay for the expense of an operation for a hematoma on his wife’s shoulder.

loans.use: to pay for a personal medical expense.

loans.name: Mercedes Rosa

texts.es:
Mercedes de 35 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de Mochumí que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona es agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Mercedes se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, actividad que viene realizando desde hace varios años en su domicilio, donde también lo vende,  tiene su propia clientela, últimamente su negocio se a incrementado en la zona donde vive, lo que le permite tener mayores ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su hogar.  

Para seguir elaborando su pan como hasta el momento a creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y utensilios para seguir preparando pan, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y brindar un poco más de comodidades para su familia.  Mercedes a sabido sacar adelante a su familia con mucho trabajo y dedicación, con la finalidad de alcanzar sus ideales propuestos.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 35, lives with her family in her own house which does not have basic utilities and is located in Mochumí District belonging to Lambayeque Department.  This is a farming, livestock raising and crafts making zone.
