Mercedes bakes bread to sell, an activity she’s been doing at home, which is also where she sells it, for many years.  She has her own clientele.  Her business where she lives has grown lately which means higher income to meet household daily expenses.

To continue baking bread like’s she’s been doing to date, she thought it advisable to request a 2000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy ingredients and utensils to continue making bread.  With income she earns she will be able to repay the loan and provide her family with a bit more comfort.  Mercedes has learned how to move her family ahead through much work and dedication with the aim in mind of reaching the goals she’s set for herself.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensiles to continue baking the bread she sells.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install potable water in his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two pigs.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi is 47 years old and is married with two children. Her daughter is 22 years old and her son is 20 years old. They both still live with her while they attend the University of Andina Cusco. 

Noemi is the owner of a small general store which sells everything from knives to toilet paper and shampoo. She is asking for a $500 loan in order to add to the products in her store. Specifically, she plans to purchase notebooks and pens to sell to students. She also plans to purchase hair products. Noemi is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pens, and hair products for her general store

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: La señora Victoria es empleada domestica; trabaja en la casa una familia en la zona central de la ciudad de La Paz y también tiene un taxi, el cual lo hace trabajar para transporte de pasajeros. El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de la movilidad, pues requiere comprar llantas  y cambios de aceites y lubricantes.  Vive en alquiler en una casa la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Llojeta Bajo  en la ciudad de La Paz; es soltera y no tiene hijos. Esta es tercera vez que solicita un crédito a través de IMPRO y la primera a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Victoria is a domestic employee.  She works in the house of a family in the central part of the city of La Paz.  She also owns a taxi that she has working providing passenger transportation.  She needs the loan to service the vehicle because she needs to buy tires, change the oil and lubricate it.  

She lives in a rented house located in the city of La Paz’s Llojeta Bajo zone.  She is single and has no children.  This is her third loan request from IMPRO and her first through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy tires and to service her taxi.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Fatmata is 43 years old and married with 2 children, ages 12 and 17. She runs a rice store in Kissy near Freetown. Her spouse is a teacher. Fatmata and her spouse take care of one relative as well as their immediate families. 

Fatmata sells rice, sugar and oil at her store. She has owned this business for 13 years and says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation of food stuff. Fatmata also earns income from renting out a house. 

Fatmata requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more bags of rice, oil and sugar. Fatmata says that the extra income from this loan will help her immensely in taking care of herself and family. In the future, she would like to sell goods on wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of rice, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Jackelin

texts.en:
Jackelin is 39 years old and lives with her partner. She has three children who are 9, 17, and 18 years old. Jackelin is the owner of a Bar Restaurant in the city of Calca. She mostly serves typical Peruvian dishes and also different kinds of pizzas. She has had her restaurant for about 5 years.

Jackelin is asking for a $600 loan in order to purchase ingredients for her restaurant such as meat, beer, vegetables, rice, corn, and soft drinks. She is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy meat, beer, vegetables, rice, corn, and soft drinks for her Bar Restaurant

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es: El señor Emilio tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería. El crédito lo requiere para  comprar venesta (madera delgada), madera, pegamento para cumplir con contratos que tiene para la fabricación de muebles.  Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Alto San Antonio  en la ciudad de La Paz; es viudo y  tiene dos hijos. Esta es la tercera vez que su crédito se canaliza a través de los financiadotes en Kiva.
texts.en: Emilio has a small carpentry shop.  The loan he needs is to buy venesta (thin wood), lumber and glue to fulfill contracts he has for furniture manufacturing.  He lives in his own house that’s located in the city of La Paz’s Alto San Antonio zone.  He’s a widower and he has two children.  This is his third time his loan has been channeled through Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his carpentry shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is married and blessed with four children. He sells shoe soles to earn a living. David has employed two people to assist him in the business.  Through Faulu Kenya, he has been trained on business management skills. This has helped him to retain his business for ten years.

David hopes to grow his business to generate more income in the future. He has requested a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy shoe soles.

loans.use: to buy shoe soles

loans.name: Darwin Efraín

texts.es:
Darwin tiene 23 años vive en Tulcan, su estado civil es unión libre, vive con su mujer y tiene 2 hijos los cuales tienen 2 añitos, y el otro 11 meses.

Es una persona tranquila, bondadosa, le gusta ser amigable y ayudar a las demás personas que lo necesiten.

Trabaja en la elaboración de ladrillos desde hace 2 años, tiene un ayudante, en su trabajo le ha ido bien si esta produciendo ladrillos.

Trabaja con FODEMI desde hace 4 años, el prestamo que requiere es para comprar una prensadora de ladrillo, gracias a la compra de esta prensadora optimizara su tiempo y mejorará su calidad de vida junto a su familia, su sueño es ayudar a mas gente y que no le falte el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en:
Darwin is 23 years old and resides in Tulcan. He is in a common-law marriage and lives with his wife and two children, ages 2 and 11 months.

Darwin is a peaceful and kind person who likes getting along with and helping people in need. He has been manufacturing bricks for two years. Darwin employs an assistant and has done very well in his job of producing bricks.

He has worked with FODEMI for four years. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a brick press. By purchasing this device, he will be able to make effective use of his time and improve the quality of life of his family. His dream is to help more people so that they can provide for the daily needs of their families.

loans.use: to purchase a brick press.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda is 47 years old and married with four children. Two of her children live separately from her while the other two still live with her while they attend University and high school. Hilda's occupation is selling crafts such as handmade satchels, blankets, and hats in various places around the city of Cusco. She runs the business with her daughter Elizabeth. 

Hilda is asking for a $600 loan in order to buy more materials to make crafts. Specifically, she plans to purchase more yarn, string, and elastic bands. Hilda is a very hardworking woman and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more yarn, string, and elastic bands to make crafts

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Elena; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara diferentes platos de comida como sopas y segundos, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, carne, pollo y verduras y también para comprar gaseosas y cervezas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria Elena is a member of the Communal Bank “Santo Domingo” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 48 years old, single, and has three children. Maria Elena divides her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business. She prepares different foods, such as soups and entrees. Maria Elena works from 7am to 9pm. Through her business, she is able to help her children move forward. She wants to expand her restaurant, so she is requesting a loan to buy rice, meat, chicken, vegetables, sodas, and beer in bulk.

Maria Elena is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, chicken, vegetables, sodas, and beer in bulk.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 47 years old and married with two children ages 13 and 23. She has been practicing livestock farming for 13 years. She also runs a food stall to earn extra income. Nancy was previously tailoring to earn a living.

She joined a group in Faulu Kenya so that she could access business loans easily. Nancy has requested 10,000 Kenya shillings to buy rabbits and animal feed. She hopes to own a ranch in the future.

loans.use: to buy rabbits and animal feed

loans.name: Ambros

texts.en:
Ambros is 30 years old and married with two children ages 4 and 6. He operates a van (matatu) transport business to earn a living.  He has five years of experience in running the business. Although his business is located in a competitive environment, Ambros is able to attract customers because of his good service.

Ambros hopes to expand his business in the future. He has requested 50,000 Kenya shillings to buy spare parts for his van.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his van

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more provisions such as Sadie, cheese and mosquito spray.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marcelina; ella tiene 51 años de edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de cafetín, ella es propietaria de un cafetín que atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, ella prepara sándwich, gaseosas, cervezas y cenas, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de cafetín. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas, cervezas y productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Marcelina is a member of the Communal Bank “Santo Domingo” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 51 years old, married, and has six children. Marcelina divides her time between her daily activities and her cafeteria business. As the owner, she manages her business between the hours of 7am and 10pm. She serves sandwiches, sodas, beer, and dinner items. Through her business, she is able to help her children get ahead. Marcelina wants to expand and improve her cafeteria business, so she is requesting a loan to buy sodas, beer, and products for cooking such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables.

Marcelina is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy sodas, beer, rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El señor Juan Carlos es empleado; trabaja en una empresa repartidora de material de escritorio y sus esposa es `profesora. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mayor cantidad de material de escritorio (papel, cartulinas, lápices, punta bolas, etc.) para empezar su propio negocio.  Vive en casas propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona Norte en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado  y tiene cinco  hijos. Sus ansias de superación para comenzar un nuevo emprendimiento, además del análisis de su flujo de caja  lo hacen merecedor de esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan Carlos is employed and works for a company that distributes writing materials.  His wife is a teacher.  The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase a large quantity of writing materials such as paper, card stock, pencils, ballpoint pens, and other items so that he can start his own business.  He lives in his own home in the northern district of the city of La Paz.  Juan Carlos is married and has five children.  

His desire to succeed motivated him to start this new venture.  In addition, the analysis of his cash flow indicates he is deserving of this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase writing materials such as paper, card stock, pencils, ballpoint pens, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy printing paper and a computer

loans.name: Tukolane Group

texts.en:
Hassan, who is in his mid-40s, is married and has four children who go to school. He has had a tailoring business since 1998.  He works from 8a.m to 10p.m daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his 6th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy a motorcycle, school expenses, household expenses and also increased on the business by buying sewing materials and has paid back all his loans successfully. He hopes for a loan to buy materials for sewing trousers and dresses. His dream is to one day be able to buy a land of his own.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Tukolane" which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans

loans.use: To buy materials for sewing trousers and dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for materials and labor in order to build a security wall.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter was born in 1974; he is married and has two children who are in school. He does tailoring to earn a living for his family. He started the business in 1999, and he has witnessed a lot of growth since he joined Faulu Kenya. He has also been able to save his money through Faulu Kenya. Peter hopes to invest in other businesses in the future. He has requested 20,000 KES to buy buttons, fabric, and thread.

loans.use: To buy buttons, fabric, and thread.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 30 years old, married, and blessed with a two-year-old child. To earn a living for his family, he has been operating a medical clinic. He has been running the business for three years and has employed two people.  

Peter has managed to grow his business with his previous loan from Faulu Kenya. He dreams of opening other business outlets in the future. He needs 70,000 KES to buy medicine.

loans.use: To buy medicine

loans.name: Mujeres De Fe Group

texts.es: Maritza Cecilia, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Mujeres de Fe, tiene 38 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo varón que es estudiante de ciclo común,  y junto a él reside en la Comunidad de Tierra Blanca. Desde el año de 1998, Maritza se dedica a la venta de tortillas. El oficio lo aprendió de una de sus tías. Su horario para elaborar las tortillas comienza desde las 6 am hasta las 11 am, ya que trabaja por pedidos de restaurantes y de cafeterías de colegios. Su mayor preocupación es cuando se aproximan las vacaciones y feriados en el sistema escolar, ya que es un periodo largo y se queda sin su fuente de ingresos, así que tiene que buscar ganarse la vida con otro tipo de negocio, a veces vendiendo frutas de la temporada. El préstamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar maíz, leña y un molino manual ya que el problema de la luz eléctrica en el país es un enorme problema. Con el apoyo del préstamo podrá seguir trabajando y así logrará cubrir todos los gastos del hogar, ya que no tiene ayuda de nadie más, también podrá seguir pagando la  educación de su hijo, ya que es un alumno sobresaliente en sus clases. Su meta empresarial es tener más clientela y vender tortillas con membrete y embolsadas, y en el aspecto familiar que su hijo se gradué y consiga un buen empleo, como maestro de educación y que después la ayude a salir adelante. Su compañera de grupo se llama Virginia del Carmen y se dedica a la venta de tortillas y leña. Este es su segundo ciclo para ambas y confían en Dios salir del compromiso de los pagos de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Maritza Cecilia is a member of the solidarity group called “Mujeres de Fe” (Women of Faith). She is 38 years old and has a son who is a student taking general education courses. They reside in the community of Tierra Blanca. Maritza has been selling tortillas since 1998 and learned this trade from one of her aunts. Her schedule for making tortillas begins at 6am and lasts through 11am. She receives orders from restaurants and school cafeterias. Her biggest concern is when the schools go on vacation break because it is a long period that she must go without a source of income. Maritza has to earn a living through another type of business, so occasionally she sells seasonal fruits.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy corn, firewood, and a hand mill because the lack of electricity is a huge problem throughout the country. With the help from this loan, she will be able to continue working and cover all of her household expenses since she does not receive assistance from anyone else. Maritza will also be able to continue paying for her son’s education because he is an outstanding student in all of his classes. Her business goals are to have more customers and to sell tortillas that are packaged and in bags. With respect to her family, she would like to see her son graduate and secure a good job, such as a teacher, so that he can help her move forward.

The other member of the group is Virginia del Carmen, who sells tortillas and firewood. Both of them are participating in their second loan cycle and place their trust in God that they will complete their payments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, and a hand mill.

loans.name: Wendy Consuelo

texts.es: Wendy Consuelo de 26 años, reside en casa propia con su hijo menor de edad. Wendy vende: desodorantes, variedad de cremas, maquillaje, champo, etc. Este negocio es el que le ha permitido sobrevivir durante muchos años ya que ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos. Es por esta razón que desea mantenerlo activo por muchos años más y seguir recibiendo los frutos del mismo. Ella es una mujer arriesgada y sobre todo responsable se pone muchas metas y una de ellas es ampliar su negocio ya que su sueño es verlo crecer y poder obtener mayores ganancias para aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida. El crédito se utilizara para la compra de cremas para el cabello, cremas para el cuerpo y para manos, champo, lociones, cosméticos, desodorantes.
texts.en:
Wendy Consuelo is 26 years old and resides in her own home with her young son. She sells deodorants, a variety of crèmes, make-up, shampoo, and other items. This business has allowed her to survive for many years and is her main source of income. For this reason, she wants to remain active for many years to come and to continue receiving the fruits of her labor. She is a fearless woman and takes full responsibility for her many goals, one of which is to expand her business. Her dream is to see it grow so that she can generate more income and aspire to a better quality of life.

This loan is being used to buy hair crèmes, body crèmes, hand crèmes, shampoo, lotions, cosmetics, and deodorants.

loans.use: to buy hair crèmes, body crèmes, hand crèmes, shampoo, lotions, cosmetics, and deodorants.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La señora Martha trabaja en la policía nacional. El crédito lo requiere para  comprar una computadora portátil que le facilitará parte de su trabajo de escribir reportes a sus superiores.  Vive en la casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani  en la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos  hijos en edad escolar. Esta es la segunda vez que  solicita un crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha works for the national police. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a laptop computer to help facilitate her work of writing reports for her superiors. She lives at the home of her parents in the District of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz. Martha is married and has two school-age children.

This is the second time she has requested a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a computer to use in her job of writing police reports.

loans.name: Liliana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Liliana es una joven de 31 años. Es soltera y tiene un hijo de un año y medio y vive junto a sus padres y sus hermanos en el cantón Santo Domingo. El clima ahí es cálido-húmedo y por esta razón esta región del país tiene una alta producción de frutas. Casi todos en la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas se dedican a producir fruta o al comercio de la misma.

Desde hace dos años ella empezó a trabajar comercializando naranjilla, una fruta exótica del sector. Su trabajo es duro ya que en la madrugada ella debe comprarla para revenderla y esto implica cargar pesadas cajas, por eso ella paga la ayuda de un joven muchacho para que haga este trabajo. A ella le preocupa la salud de su pequeño hijo ya que ha sufrido de algunas molestias en su corta vida por lo que ella quiere mejorar sus ingresos para solventar esta necesidad. Ella quiere invertir en cajas de la fruta que vende, de manera que al comprar más cajas el precio sea menor y así tener mejores ingresos.

A Liliana le interesa mucho la salud de su hijo y sobre todo su educación. Ella sueña con poder tener una casa propia y que a su hijo nunca le falte nada.
texts.en:
Liliana is a young woman who is 31 years of age. She is single and has a son who is 1½ years old. Liliana lives with her parents and siblings in the canton of Santo Domingo. The climate in this area is warm and humid, which is why there is a high level of fruit production. Nearly everyone in the province of Santo Domingo de Los Tsáchilas produces or sells fruit.

Two years ago Liliana began selling “naranjillas”, an exotic fruit that comes from this region. Her work is difficult because she has to start at dawn by buying what she will sell, which requires carrying heavy boxes. For this reason, she pays a young man to help her with this work. Liliana is worried about the health of her young son who has suffered from a few ailments in his short life, so she wants to improve her income in order to provide for his needs. She wants to invest in boxes of fruit to sell. By purchasing more boxes, the unit price is less and she will be able to generate more income.

Liliana is very interested in her son’s health and providing for his education. She dreams of having her own home and seeing that her son lacks nothing.

loans.use: to buy boxes of "naranjillas".

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 35 years old and married with three children aged between 10 and 24. She runs an electrical appliances store in Grassfield, east of Freetown.

Hannah has owned this business for years and sells televisions, DVDs and home theaters at her store. She also earns income from renting out a house. She says that the main challenges to her business are the rainy season and price fluctuations.

Hannah requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more electrical appliances. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her business to grow bigger. In the future, she would like to supply big companies.

loans.use: to purchase more electrical appliances such as televisions and DVD players.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su hijo de 15 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta de juguetes y artesanías, vende todos los días, en las aceras de las escuelas, en ocasiones también vende en el mercado.
Por el momento quiere compara un lote de mercadería, calcomanías, poster, juguetes, pulseras y collares, para esto solicita un préstamo que le ayude a salir con la compra, ya que entre más artículos tenga, será mejor la venta con sus clientes.
El tiene el negocio para proveer para su hijo todo lo necesario y sobre todo el estudio, dándole la oportunidad de superarse.
texts.en:
Oscar lives with his 15-year-old son. He sells toys and crafts every day on the school sidewalks, but occasionally he also sells at the market. At the moment, Oscar wants to buy a lot of merchandise that includes stickers, posters, toys, bracelets, and necklaces. For this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can proceed with this purchase. By having more items, he will be able to improve his sales to his customers.

Oscar is in business so that he can provide for all of his son’s needs, especially his education which will give him the opportunity to succeed.

loans.use: to buy stickers, posters, toys, bracelets, and necklaces.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: La señora Paulina tiene un puesto de venta de abarrotes en el mercado Rodríguez. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería como ser: azúcar, fideo y demás productos para abastecer y tener un stock para vender a sus clientes. Vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona Las Lomas en la ciudad de La Paz; es soltera y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO y está siendo canalizado a través de los financiadores en Kiva.
texts.en:
Paulina has a stand selling groceries at the Rodríguez market.  She needs the loan to buy merchandise like sugar, noodles, and other products to stock her store and to have stock to sell to her customers.

She lives in her own house, which is located in the Las Lomas zone in the city of La Paz.  She is single and has two children.

This is the first time she has had a loan with IMPRO.  The loan is being funded through Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like sugar, noodles, and rice, etc. for her grocery store.

loans.name: Luz Angélica

texts.es:
Luz tiene 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Tulcán con sus dos hijos y un nieto de 6 años es soltera y se describe como una persona tranquila y le gusta ser amigable.

Trabaja en la crianza de vacas con su hermano desde hace 5 años le va muy bien con sus animalitos.

Lleva trbajando con FODEMI 2 años, el crédito que solicita es para comprar una vaca con la cual va a tener más producción de leche lo que significa más ingresos en su hogar y encontrar na mejor calidad de vida, Luz sueña en encrementar la cantidad de ganado poco a poco y así ayudar a su familia y a las demás personas.
texts.en:
Luz is 44 years old, and lives in the city of Tulcán with her ​​two children and a 6 year old grandchild.  She is single and describes herself as a quiet person, who likes to be friendly.

She has been working raising cattle with her brother for 5 years, and is doing very well with her animals.

She has been working with FODEMI for 2 years.  The loan that she is requesting is to buy a cow which will give her more milk production, which means more income for her household and a better quality of life.

Luz dreams of increasing her livestock numbers slowly and in this way helping her family and other people.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Prisca

texts.es: La señora Prisca trabaja como costurera en un taller de costura de su propiedad y su esposo trabaja como carpintero. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como ser: telas, cierres, forros y otros insumos para su taller. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona Ernesto Torres en la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene un hijo. Esta es la segunda vez que su crédito es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Prisca works as a seamstress in her own sewing workshop.  Her husband works as a carpenter.  

She needs the loan to buy basic supplies like fabric, zippers, lining, and other supplies for her workshop.

She lives in her parents’ house, which is located in the Ernesto Torre zone in the city of La Paz.  She is married and has a son.  

This is the second time that she has requested a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fabric, zippers, lining, and other supplies for her sewing workshop.

loans.name: Alppha

texts.fr: Monsieur Alpha  est un jeune technicien de 35 ans.  Il est marié et père de 3 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 3 et 5 ans. Il est spécialisé dans la réparation de téléviseurs. En même temps  il s’active dans la commercialisation de télévisions et d’habillage de téléphones portables depuis 2004. C’est une activité qu’il a choisi par amour. C’est aussi pendant la période de chaleur voire l’hivernage  et surtout avec les coupures d’électricités  que ses affaires marchent le plus. Alpha est un habitué de son guichet locale puisqu’il y a déjà remboursé 3 crédits antérieurs. Son adhésion  date du mois de mai 2009. Il emprunte un montant de 300 000frs avec lequel il compte s’approvisionner en habillages de téléphones portables et téléviseurs d’occasion destinés a la vente. Avec ce financement il souhaite renforcer son stock de marchandises, améliorer ses gains financiers pour ainsi stabiliser son niveau de vie.
texts.en:
Mr. Alpha is a young technician of 35. He is married and a father of three children aged three to five.
He specializes in repairing televisions. At the same time, he has been active in the retail of TVs and cell phone cases since 2004. He chose this business out of love. His business is also at its most successful during the hot and rainy seasons, and is especially brisk with power outages.
Alpha is familiar with the Baye Laye counter, since he has already repaid three previous loans there. He joined the organization in May 2009. He is borrowing a total of 300,000 XOF with which he plans on stocking up on cell phone cases and refurbished TVs intended for retail. With this financing, he hopes to increase his inventory, grow his profit, and thus stabilize his standard of living.

loans.use: to buys cell phones cases and refurbished televisions to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make home improvements and buy construction materials.

loans.name: Blanca Atalia

texts.en:
Blanca lives and works in the Santo Domingo canton of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas. Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is one of the largest cities in Ecuador, with 500,000 inhabitants. But you'd never guess the size of the city from the tranquil pace of life there. Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is in a tropical, humid area of Ecuador, renowned for its natural beauty, its huge markets and its trade in livestock – the largest in the country.

Blanca is a 63-year-old widow. She has five children, now adults, aged 38, 36, 34, 30 and 23. She lives with her youngest child, her son Pablo, who is currently attending university. In her spare time, Blanca loves to walk.

Blanca buys and sells clothes, which she orders from a catalog. She learned this work from her sister-in-law. This is Blanca's second loan with Fundación Alternativa and her first loan through Kiva. She will use her loan to buy new merchandise. You can see some of her merchandise, in this case some colorful underwear for sale, in the photo. 

Blanca works on her clothing business for about five hours a day. She has been able to shorten her workday because of the help of her son. She says the hardest part of her work is charging her clients. 

She has dedicated her life to working so that she could provide education for all of her children. This was especially difficult when they lived in Quito and were renting their home. Blanca's dream is to see her youngest child finish university and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal “Vamos Juntas” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco.  Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las nuevas siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. 

En el lugar conocimos al señor Rosendo que nació en la provincia de Quispicanchis(Cusco, Perú), tiene 63 años de edad y tiene un hijo, y nos cuenta:

“Vivo en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizo mis actividades económicas que es la venta de verduras, Yo compro verduras de los proveedores del valle sagrado y después los productos llevo a vender a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado”. 

Ya son 5 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Este crédito es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo maíz, papa, coliflor, lechuga, cebolla, etc.
texts.en:
The Community Bank "Vamos Juntas" ("We Come Together") meets monthly in the city of Cusco.  Cusco is known for being a popular tourist area, a business center, and for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven new wonders of the world.

In this place, we get to know Señor Rosendo, who was born in the province of Quispicanchis (in Cusco, Peru).  He is 63 years old and has one child, and he tells us:

"I live in the city of Cusco, where I conduct my business, which is selling vegetables.  I buy vegetables from suppliers in the Sacred Valley and then take the products for sale to the city of Puerto Maldonado."

He has been working in this business for five years already, and doing very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work. This loan is to buy merchandise such as corn, potatoes, cauliflower, lettuce, onions, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as corn, potatoes, cauliflower, lettuce, onions, etc.

loans.name: Idrissa M

texts.en:
Idrissa is 42 years old and married with four children, ages between 7 and 15. He runs a Pharmacy in Grassfield, which is a neighborhood in Freetown. He also has three relatives he takes care of as well as their immediate family. 

Idrissa has owned this business for 5 years and sells blood tonic, capsules, and various types of medicines at his drugs store. He also earns income from renting out a house. He says that the main challenge to his business is fluctuation in prices.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase various types of drugs. Idrissa says that the extra income from this loan will help him expand his house. In the future, he would like to be a supplier of drugs and expand his business more.

loans.use: to purchase various types of medicines such as malaria drugs and blood tonic.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: La señora Maria Margarita, ella tiene 53 años, tiene 3hijos que ya son mayores de edad, ella tiene su negocio que es la venta de comida. Está ubicada en su vivienda, trabaja todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche pues la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a comprar los diferentes platillos que ofrece, lleva más de 20 años en su negocio y nos cuenta que le va muy bien. Este crédito es para comprar arroz, plátano verde, queso, papas, repollos, bolsas, huevos, aceite y otros ingredientes y productos necesarios para la preparación de los alimentos. Su deseo es seguir adelante en su negocio y que los clientes sigan llegando todos los días.
texts.en: Mrs. Maria Margarita is 53 years old, has 3 children who are independent, and sells food for a living. Her business is located in her own home. She works everyday from 8 in the morning to 10 at night since the majority of of her clients come to buy the variety of plates she sells. She has been working in this business for more than 20 years and she tells us business is going very well. She will use this loan to buy rice, green plantains, cheese, potatoes, cabbage, eggs, oil, and other ingredients and products needed to make meals. Her wish is to continue with her business and for her clients to continue coming everyday.

loans.use: buy rice, green plantains, cheese, potatoes, cabbage, bags, eggs, oil, and other ingredients

loans.name: Ever

texts.es: El señor Ever es empleado en un taller de torneria, cumpliendo labores como tornero. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación de estudios universitarios ya que el se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Derecho (Leyes). Ever vive en casa de su tía  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani en la ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO y por la cualidad social del mismo es que solicitamos la ayuda de los financiadores en Kiva.
texts.en: Ever is employed in a metal shop working as a lathe operator.  He needs the loan to pay off his university costs since he’s studying Law.  Ever lives in his aunt’s house which is located in the Tembladerani zone in the city of La Paz.  He’s single and has no children.  This is the first time he’s gotten an IMPRO loan and because of the social nature of it we are requesting help from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay tuition to continue his Law studies.

loans.name: Jose Amadeo

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la venta de artesanía y venta de calzado (chancletas, zapatos de playa), tiene un hijo y su esposa a cargo, su negocio lo administra desde hace algún tiempo, vende de forma ambulante.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprarse collares, pulseras, aretes, y ofrecer a sus clientes, que en su mayoría son jóvenes.
El sueño de José es comprarse en el futuro un vehículo para poder salir a verde en el, transportando la mercadería más fácilmente.
texts.en: José sells artisan crafts and sells shoes (sandals, beach shoes) has a son and a wife under his care. He has been doing his job for some time and does so by foot. At the moment, he is requesting a loan to buy necklaces, bracelets, earrings to offer them to his clients which are mostly young. José's dream is to buy a vehicle in the future to go out and sell with and transporting his merchandise easily.

loans.use: to buy necklaces, bracelets, earrings for his business.

loans.name: Elva Silvana

texts.es:
Elva tiene 27 años vive en Tulcán con su hijo de 1 año, es soltera, se describe como una persona alegre, colaboradora y le gusta ser amigable.

Trabaja en la crianza de cerdos sola desde hace 5 años, le va muy bien en su trabajo.

Es la primera vez que trabaja con FODEMI, con el crédito que solicita piensa comprar más cerdos para seguir en la crianza, con este préstamo su negocio cambiaría ya que aumentarían las ventas y tendría una mejor calidad de vida junto a su hijo, su anhelo es ver crecer con mucha salud a su hijo y ver que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Elva is 27 years old, lives in Tulcán with her 1 year old son, and is single. She describes herself as being cheerful, cooperative, and likes to be friendly.

For 5 years she has been raising and selling pigs and is doing very well with her business.

This is the first time she works with FODEMI. She plans on using the loan to buy more pigs to raise. This loan will help her make more sales and allow her to have a better quality of life with her son. Her desire is to watch her son grow with health and watch her business grow.

loans.use: buy more pigs.

loans.name: Houdalo

texts.fr:
Houdalo est une femme âgée de 56 ans.Elle est veuve et sans enfant.
Houdalo travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2000. Elle vend du charbon de bois et revend à domicile dans sa maison sise à Adamavo.Elle effectue seule cette activité.
Houdalo a requis son deuxième crédit de WAGES afin de s’approvisionner en sacs de charbons de bois.
texts.en: Houdalo is a 56-year-old woman, a widow with no children. She has been working as a retailer since 2000. She sells charcoal and resells out of her house located in Adamavo. This is the only work she does. Houdalo has requested her second loan from WAGES to stock up on sacks of charcoal.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: El señor Oscar recibe un bono que el Estado Boliviano le brinda por la edad que tiene (75 años) y también recibe giros que su esposa y sus hijos le envían desde el exterior. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación del tratamiento de Diabetes al que se somete mensualmente. El señor vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de San Pedro en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene dos hijos que ya no dependen de él. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO y por el carácter social del mismo es que lo canalizamos a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Oscar gets a stipend from the Government of Bolivia due to his age (he’s 75 years old) and he also receives stipends that his wife and children send him from abroad.  He needs the loan to pay for Diabetes treatments that he receives monthly.  He lives in his own house that’s located in La Paz’s San Pedro zone.  He’s married and has two children that no longer depend on him.  This is the first time he’s gotten an IMPRO loan and because of its social character we are channeling it through Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for his diabetes treatments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in his business by buying chicken, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Modelo Group

texts.es: María del Carmen, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Modelo, tiene 50 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 5 hijos, y reside en Barrio Belén. Desde hace tres años atrás María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, una de sus nueras la ayuda a trabajar, y lo hacen desde las 3 am hasta las 12 del mediodía. De vez en cuando cuenta con la ayuda económica de algunos de sus hijos, pero es muy poco, ya que la vivienda donde reside es rentada y el alquiler es caro, y parte su hijo menor aún está estudiando. Su ventaja es que las tortillas son un producto que las personas consumen a diario varias veces al día, así que le va muy bien con las ventas. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de leña, maíz, cal y maseca. Los préstamos que ha recibido le han ayudado mucho porque ha podido para sacar adelante su familia. Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia para poder ampliar su negocio y vivir mejor. Su compañera de grupo Enma Neptalia se dedica a la venta de joyas y plata. Es este es el quinto ciclo de María y no ha tenido problemas de mora, ya que ahorra a diario para pagar sus cuotas.
texts.en: María del Carmen is a member of the communal bank "Modelo."  She is 50 years old, and is a single mother of 5 who resides in the Belen neighborhood.  For 5 years, Maria has been making and selling tortillas.  One of her daughter-in-laws taught her how to do this.  She works from 3am until noon.  At times she relies on the economic assistance of some of her children, but this is a small help, because the home where she lives is rented and the rent is very high, and her youngest child is still in school.  Her advantage is that tortillas are a product that people consume a number of times each day, and so her sales are going very well.  The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of firewood, corn, limes and corn flour.  The loans that she has received have helped her a lot because she has been able to provide for her family.  Her main dream is to have her own house so that she could expand her business and live better.  Her fellow group member, Enma Neptalia, has a business selling jewelry and silver.  This is Maria's 5th loan cycle, and she has not had problems with late payments, since she saves on a daily basis to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, limes and corn flour

loans.name: Dario

texts.en:
Dario lives and works in La Concordia, a canton in the Esmeraldas province in northeast Ecuador. Esmeraldas is known for its warm subtropical climate, its incredible beaches, and its thriving agricultural economy.

Dario is fifty four years young and divorced; he lives alone. In his spare time he likes playing sports, particularly soccer, though these days he does a bit more watching than playing. 

This is Dario's first loan with Kiva. Dario raises and sells pigs, and he will use his loan to to buy more pigs and feed. He is a self-taught entrepreneur, and decided on this business because he likes working with animals. He spends much of his time working, and he receives help from no-one. Dario also works in a school part-time as a janitor, which doesn't leave a lot of time for raising the pigs. It's particularly hard for him to find time to clean the stall, which takes a while. He hopes through this loan he can buy more pigs and increase his profits, bettering his quality of life in the process.

Dario's hopes for the future are to improve his business, increase his income, and "find a partner with whom he can share the rest of his days."

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es: La señora Maria Eugenia se dedica a la elaboración de masitas como ser empanadas, queques, galletitas y otros. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como ser harina, azúcar, levadura para continuar con su negocio, pues los ingresos que genera son importantes para ella. Maria Eugenia vive en  alquiler en una casa,  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Bajo Tacagua en la ciudad de La Paz; es soltera  y no tiene hijos. Ella ha solicitado que su crédito sea a través de Kiva, pues esta será la cuarta vez que los financiadotes de Kiva le ayudan a continuar con su negocio.
texts.en: María Eugenia makes baked goods like turnovers, cakes, cookies and others.  She needs the loan to buy raw ingredients like flour, sugar and yeast to stay in business because the income she earns is important to her.  María Eugenia lives in a rented house that’s located in La Paz’s Bajo Tacagua zone.  She is single and has no children.  She has requested that her loan be through Kiva because this will be the fourth time that Kiva lenders have helped her to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy bread baking ingredients.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Adjo est une femme âgée de 35ans.Elle est célibataire avec un enfant en charge.
Adjo travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2008.Elle revend des produits d’alimentation générale à la déventure de sa maison.Elle achète au marché d’Adawlato.Elle gère seule son activité.
Adjo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des cartons de tomates en conserve,des sacs de riz,des cartons de sardines et bien d’autres produits rentrant dans l’alimentation.
texts.en:
Adjo is a single woman aged 35. She is single and raising one child. 

Adjo has been working as a small-scale food retailer since 2008. She sells groceries in front of her house. She buys her goods at the market of Adawlato. She manages her little business alone. 

Adjo requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy cartons of tomato paste, sacks of rice, cartons of sardines, and various other grocery products.

loans.use: to buy various foodstuffs for resale.

loans.name: Atsoupi

texts.fr:
Atsoupi est  une femme âgée de 38 ans. Elle est mariée à un informaticien. Elle a trois enfants.
Atsoupi travaille comme revendeuse  depuis 2008. Elle  vend des produits dans l’alimentation générale  dans sa boutique sis après le marché  Novissi à Kpogan. Elle  achète les produits à Lomé au Grand Marché d’Adawlato. Elle travaille  sans aucune aide dans sa boutique.
Atsoupi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter certains produits notamment du riz, du sucre, du lait, et du spaghetti
texts.en: Atsoupi is a 38-year-old woman who is married to a computer specialist. She has three children. She has been working as a retailer since 2008 and sells grocery items in her shop located in the back of the Novissi market in Kpogan. She buys her supplies in Lomé at the Grand Market of Adawlato. She works without any help in her shop. Atsoupi has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy certain goods, especially rice, sugar, milk, and spaghetti.

loans.use: to buy grocery items

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
Benito, vive con su esposa y tiene tres hijos, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado, cultivo de maíz y maicillo, él inicio desde joven a sembrar porque aprendió al lado de su padre cuando era joven.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y pesticidas para aplicarlo al cultivo de maíz, este préstamo le ayudara a comprar el abono en mejor precio y dar el cuido necesario al cultivo.
Su mayor sueño en comprar ganado y aumentarlo en sus terrenos, ya que es un mejor negocio y deja mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Benito lives with his wife and has three children.  He works raising cattle and growing corn and sorghum.  He started as a young man, as he learned to grow crops alongside his father when he was young.

He is requesting a loan to purchase manure and pesticides to apply to his crop of corn.  This loan will help him to buy the manure at the best price and to provide the necessary care for his crops.

His biggest dream is to buy livestock and to increase his land, as this will make for a better business and provide better profits.

loans.use: to buy manure and pesticides to apply to his crop of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make home improvements and buy construction materials.

loans.name: Celia Pilar

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Celia Pilar; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de contadora, ella tiene una oficina donde trabaja independiente desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere que su hijo termine de estudiar la carrera profesional de sistemas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar una computadora para su hijo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "SANTO DOMINGO".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Celia Pilar.  She is 48 years old and married with one son.  The member combines her daily activities with her work as an accountant.  She has an office where she works independently from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm.  Though this work, the member has been to move her son ahead in life.  The member wants her son to finish studying for a professional career in systems

The member is requesting the loan to purchase a computer for her son.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the repayments.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her son.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Adjo   est une femme âgée de 39 ans. Elle est mariée à un plombier. Elle a trois enfants.
Adjo est couturière de formation mais travaille aussi comme revendeuse depuis 2001.Elle revend des pagnes et des produits de mercerie à Agodekè. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et mène cette activité toute seule.
Adjo a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et des produits de mercerie.
texts.en:
Adjo is a 39-year old woman. She is married to a plumber. She has three children. Adjo is a seamstress by training but she also works as a vendor since 2001. She sells “pagnes” [traditional colorful fabrics] and sewing supplies in Agodekè. She stocks up in Lomé and works on her own.

Adjo has requested her third loan from WAGES in order to buy sets of “pagnes” fabric and sewing supplies.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and traditional fabrics

loans.name: Mesías Hugo

texts.es:
Mesías tiene 28 años vive en T. junto a su madre y hermano, no tiene hijos y se describe como una persona trabajadora, tranquila, amistosa, dedicada y preocupado por su familia.

Trabaja en agricultura en el cultivo de papas solo, empezó a trabajar como jornalero y cuando tuvo experiencia decidió trabajar su propia tierra, empezó con su labor hace 11 años.

Realiza créditos a FODEMI desde hace 2 años este sería su tercer crédito, este prestamo lo va a utilizar en la compra de abono para el sembrío de papas que están de 4 meses de siembre.

Con la ayuda de este préstamo mejoraría su producción y sus ventas y a la vez mejoraría la calidad de vida de el y el de su familia, aspira llegar a comprar una casa ya que ellos viven arrendando, también comprar electrodomésticos para su casa.
texts.en:
Mesías is 28 years old and lives in T. with his mother and brother.  He doesn't have any children and is described as a hard worker, quiet, friendly, dedicated and concerned about his family.

He works in agriculture in the cultivation of solely potatoes.  He began working as a laborer and when he had experience he decided to work his own land. Mesías began his work 11 years ago.

He has been getting loans from FODEMI for 2 years, this would be his third loan.  He will use this loan to buy fertilizer for planting potatoes that are within 4 months of sowing.

With the help of this loan, Mesías would improve his production and sales and also improve the quality of life for his family.  He aspires to buy a house because they are leasing.  He also wants to buy appliances for his home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for planting potatoes.

loans.name: Kadie

texts.en:
Kadie is 46 years old and married with five children, ages between 15 and 32. She runs a Cement store in Waterloo in the western rural of Freetown. She also has one employee at her store. Four of her children are currently attending school. The child in secondary school is married. 

Kadie has owned this business for 20 years and sells cement at her store. Her business is the main source of income she has. She says that the main challenge to her business is price fluctuation.

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more cement and building material. Kadie says that the extra income from this loan will help her improve her standard of living. In the future, she plans to open a cement making business.

loans.use: To purchase more cement and building material.

loans.name: Karla Maria

texts.es:
Karla, es empleada, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella trabaja D. lunes a viernes en la alcaldía municipal, tiene más D. un año, trabaja D. lunes a viernes D. 8:00am a 4:30 pm, los sábados D. 8:00am a 12:00md.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para solventar unos gastos personales, pues ha comprado unos materiales D. cocina y los quiere pagar completamente, este préstamo le ayudara a librarse D. otras deudas y tener los materiales y utensilios D. cocina.
Su objetivo es trabajar por sus hijos, con el préstamo espera cancelarlo debidamente y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Karla is employed, and lives with her two children and husband.  She works Monday through Friday for the municipal government, where she has been for more than a year.  She works Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 pm, and Saturday from 8:00am to noon.

She is requesting a loan to pay for some personal expenses, as she has bought some kitchen equipment and wants to pay for them completely.  This loan will help her to get free from her other debts and have the kitchen equipment and utensils.

Her aim is to work for her children.  She expects to pay back the loan promptly and to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for kitchen equipment.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gloria; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant y también tiene un negocio de venta de comida que lo realiza los días domingos en el baratillo que es un lugar donde vende cosas de segunda mano, la socia trabaja en el restaurant desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere implementar su restaurant y ampliar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y carne al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "SANTO DOMINGO".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Gloria.  She is 38 years old, she lives with her partner and has 5 children.  The member combines her daily activities with the business of  a restaurant.  She also has a business selling food that takes place on Sundays in the flea market where people sell second hand goods.  The member works at the restaurant from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm.  Through these businesses, the member helps her children to get ahead in life.  

The member wants to increase her restaurant business and expand her business selling food.  The member is requesting the loan to buy cooking products such as rice, vegetables and meat at wholesale.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the repayments.

loans.use: to buy products for cooking, such as rice, vegetables, and meat at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his home by building a kitchen

loans.name: Afi Justine

texts.fr:
Afi est une femme âgée de 41ans, elle est mariée à un cultivateur. Elle est mère de Trois enfants.
Couturière de profession, Afi travaille aujourd’hui comme revendeuse et ce depuis 1990.Elle revend des produits de mercerie à Baguida en allant à Adamavo et pour cela elle achète à la capitale .Elle ne se fait pas aider  dans son commerce. 
Afi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits de mercerie.
texts.en:
Afi is 41 years old and married to a farmer with whom she has three children. She is a seamstress by training but began working as a tradeswoman in 1990. She sources haberdashery from the country's capital and sells it at Baguida and Adamavo. She works completely on her own. 
Afi is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase haberdashery products.

loans.use: to purchase haberdashery

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elsa; ella tiene 60 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara almuerzos y cenas, ella prepara platos como pollo al horno, tallarín con pollo, sopas entre otros platos, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, pollo, verduras y carne al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Elsa. She is 60 years old, married and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business. She serves lunch and dinner. She prepares dishes like roast chicken, noodles with chicken, soups and other plates. She works from 7:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. Through this job, she has helped her children to get ahead. She would like to expand and improve her restaurant business. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients for cooking, such as rice, chicken, vegetables and meat. She will buy these wholesale.

Elsa is very happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like rice, chicken, vegetables and meat wholesale

loans.name: Amoko

texts.fr:
Amoko est une femme âgée de 30ans,Elle est mariée à un peintre –auto.Elle est mère de trois enfants .
Amoko travaille comme couturière et revendeuse  depuis 2006 .Elle vend des pagnes et des produits de mercerie à domivile à Kpogan.Elle achète à Lomé et ses environs .Elle travaille seule sans aucune aide.
Amoko a requis son premier crédit  de WAGES afin  d’acheter des pagnes et des produits de mercerie.
texts.en:
Amoko is a 30 year-old woman married to a painter and driver with whom she has three children. Amoko has worked as a seamstress and tradeswoman since 2006. She sells pagnes (colourful waxed cloths) and haberdashery from home at Kpogan. She purchases her wares from Lomé and the surrounding area, and works alone. 
Amoko is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase more wax cloths and haberdashery items.

loans.use: to purchase pagnes (colourful wax cloths) and haberdashery

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es: Maria De Lourdes de 74años es una mujer que disfruta de su actividad. Ella  se dedica a la venta de frijoles cosidos y tamales, el cual inició hace 45 años, Sus clientes, son amigos, vecinos, referidos que circulan por su vivienda donde está ubicado su negocio. Aunque su gran desafío es la alta competencia, se sostiene con precios justos y con su natural amabilidad y vocación de servicio que favorecen la sostenibilidad de su clientela. Esta es la razón por la cual inicia su historial crediticio, solicitando este crédito para la compra al por mayor de frijoles y leña para su negocio.
texts.en: Maria De Lourdes, 74, is a woman who enjoys her work. She sells cooked beans and tamales, which she has been doing for 45 years. Her customers are friends, neighbors and referrals who pass by her home, which is where her business is located. Although her great challenge is the high level of competition, she sustains her business with fair prices, her natural friendliness, and dedication to providing service that keeps her clients coming back. This is why she has started her credit history by requesting this loan, which is for buying beans and firewood wholesale for her business.

loans.use: to buy beans and firewood wholesale

loans.name: Hawley Helbert

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Hawley Helbert; el tiene 22 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de cusco, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el servicio de taxi. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro, para comprar repuestos como llantas.
  
                                              
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Mr. Hawley Helbert. He is 22 years old, single and has one son. He divides his time between his daily activities and his transportation business. He has a car that he uses for a taxi service around the streets of the city of Cusco. He works from 5:00 AM until 9:00 PM and would like to expand and improve his taxi service. He is requesting a loan for car maintenance and to buy spare parts, such as tires.
  
                                              
Hawley is very happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with his repayment schedule.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his car and to buy spare parts like tires

loans.name: Mabomba Mengi Group

texts.en:
Balozi, who is in his early forties, is married with three children, two of whom go to school. He has had a tailoring business since 1988. He works from 8am to 6pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. 

This will be his fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy sewing materials and household expenses and has paid back all his loans successfully. He hopes for a loan to buy an overlocking machine. His dream is to own more sewing machines so that he can win big government tenders.

He will share this loan with his loan group, "Mabomba Mengi", which has a total of 18 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy an overlocking machine.

loans.name: Criselda Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora  Criselda  Guadalupe   forma parte de el grupo  se dedica a la venda de agua estudio hasta   la  preparatoria, tiene  la cantidad de  tres hijos  una  mujer y dos varones, tiene tres años vendiendo  agua.
Se considera una persona  trabajadora  ya que aparte de vender agua también vende  dulces , lo que mas desea es que sus  hijos terminen su licenciatura.
Sus clientes le recomienda que ponga una  fonda  de comida por que donde  vive hay muchos locales y le convendría  vender comida.
Ella pidió el préstamo  para  comprar  ingredientes para la  elaboración de comida  para  vender en un pequeño local que tiene  cerca de su casa y  a si obtener mas ganancias.
Le da las gracias a fundación  por el apoyo que le ha dado  para salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Ms. Criselda Guadalupe is part of a group who sells water.  She has a high school education and has three children, one girl and 2 boys.  She has been selling water for three years.

She is considered to be a hard worker and apart from selling water she also sells candy.  What she wants most is that her children complete their degrees.

Her customers advised her to install a food catering business as there are many places where she lives and she should be selling them food.  She asked for the loan to buy ingredients to prepare food to sell in a small shop that she has close to her home, and also to gain more profits.  She thanked the foundation for the support it has given her to move forward and fulfill her dreams.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food preparation.

loans.name: El Arbolito Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Carmen es presidenta de la Alcancía Comunal “El Arbolito”, conformado por 11 integrantes. El nombre que le pusieron al grupo representa el crecimiento paulatino que ellas desarrollan en el grupo; así como una planta que crece hasta convertirse en un árbol.
Carmen es casada y tiene tres hijos, dos ya son adultos e independientes. Ella se dedica hace 8 años a la compra y venta de artículos usados, negocio que le genera muy buena rentabilidad, tanto así que ha conseguido armar su casa y ampliarla adecuadamente para su familia. Antes, Carmen buscaba trabajos eventuales como servicio de limpieza o lavando ropa, pero su esposo le hizo ver que podían trabajar juntos y generar más ingresos. Así es como Carmen decide meterse de lleno a este negocio y a la vez reforzar los lazos de pareja con su esposo.
Dentro de sus metas más próximas, está el adquirir una “Mototaxi” (Motocicleta adaptada para brindar servicio de movilidad con pasajeros) para ponerlo a trabajar; también quiere ampliar su negocio a fin de tener un almacén donde guardar sus excedentes de mercadería.
texts.en:
Señora Carmen is president of the Community Bank "El Arbolito" ("The Sapling"), which consists of 11 members.  The name they gave to the group represents the gradual growth with which they are developing in the group, as well as a plant that grows into a tree.

Carmen is married and has three children, two of whom are grown and financially independent.  She has spent 8 years buying and selling used items, a business that generates good profitability for her, and through which she has managed to build a home, and expand it and for her family.  Beforehand, Carmen looked for odd jobs cleaning or washing clothes, but her husband saw that they could work together and generate more income. This is how Carmen decided to get herself into this business while strengthening her relationship with her ​​husband.

Among her immediate goals is to acquire a "Mototaxi" (a motorcycle adapted to provide transport service for passengers) to put to work.  She also wants to expand her business and have a warehouse to store her surplus merchandise.

loans.use: to acquire a "Mototaxi" (a motorcycle adapted to provide transport service for passengers)

loans.name: Teresa Jesus

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Teresa, La socia tiene 57 años de edad, la socia es casada y  tiene 3 hijos de 30, 28 y 20 años de edad, la socia es doce4nte de profesión de primaria, la socia paralelamente a esta actividad realiza trabajos hechos a mano como cerámica en frio, pintura en tela, tejidos de compras para bebes desde hace 7 años para la venta, manualidades varias y artesanía; La socia  requiere el crédito para comprar lanas, arcilla, pinturas para tela y para teñir la cerámica y realizar trabajos decorativos para la venta a sus amistades y público en general que aprecie el buen arte de este modo la socia tendrá la oportunidad de incrementar sus ganancias y poder pagar los estudios superiores de sus hijos en la universidad. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de lanas para chompas, pinturas, cerámica para realizar diversos trabajos y manualidades.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Maria Elena Moyano communal bank in Huanchac district, Cusco department and province.
Teresa, 57, is married and has 3 sons and daughters, 30, 28 and 20.  She is a primary school teacher and also does handicrafts such as modeled clay ceramics, painting on cloth, knit-ware for babies through 7 years, and she also sells various crafts and handiwork. 

She needs the loan to buy wool, clay, paints for cloth and ceramics.  She wants to do decorative work to sell to friends and the public in general who appreciate good art.  This will give her the opportunity to increase her earnings and be able to pay the school expenses of her children in the university  She is requesting financing to buy wool for sweaters, paints, and ceramics for different work and crafts.

loans.use: to buy wool for sweaters, paints and ceramics to do different crafts

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta D. semillas D. marañón, vive con sus tres hijos y su esposo, tiene muchos años D. estar vendiendo la semilla D. marañón, es un negocio D. familia y hasta el momento le ha proveído lo necesario para su hogar.
Ella invertirá su préstamo en la compra D. semillas, que le ayuden para crecer en la mercadería y poder vender por un buen tiempo este producto, pues sus ingresos dependen únicamente D. él.
Ella quiere crecer en el mercado, asistir a otros lugares a vender para conocer nuevos cliente y aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Maria sells cashew nuts. She lives with her three children and her husband. She has been selling cashew nuts for many years in this family business, which up to now has provided sufficiently for household expenses. She will use her loan to buy nuts, which will help her to increase the quantity of her merchandise and enable her to sell the nuts for a while, since her income depends solely upon them. She wants to expand in the marketplace and go to other localities where she can sell her product, thereby attracting new customers and increasing her earnings.

loans.use: to buy cashew nuts.

loans.name: Mayra Liliana

texts.es:
Mayra tiene 21 años vive en Tulcán con sus padres, no tiene hijos, se describe como una persona seria, tranquila, correcta que le gusta hacer las cosas bien y con cariño, es muy dedicada a su trabajo y cuida a sus padres a los que mantiene.

Trabaja en un local comercial de venta de verduras con su cuñada, frente al mercado del sur en Tulcán, empezó con un pequeño capital que le dió su madre hace 12 años lo cual por la situación económica ella no pudo seguir estudiando.

Es su tercer crédito que realiza a FODEMI en 2 años, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de frutas y verduras para surtir a su local y poder invrementar las ventas y así poder ayudar a su familia en los gastos que necesiten.

Su sueño es poner un mini mercado, incrementar sus ventas y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia ya que son precarias, también quisiera llegar a mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Mayra is 21 years old and lives in Tulcán with her parents. She doesn’t have children. She is characterized as a serious, calm and correct person who likes to do things well and with care. She is very dedicated to her work and takes care of her parents.
She works at a local business center selling vegetables with her aunt. It is located in front of the market in southern Tulcán. She started this business with a small amount of capital that her mother gave her twelve years ago. She was not able to continue with her studies because of her economic situation.
This is the third loan she has received from FODEMI in the past two years. She will use this loan to buy more fruits and vegetables in order to provide more variety to her customers. In this way she can help her family with the expenses that they incur. 
Her dream is to open a mini-market, increase her sales and improve the quality of life for her family, as it is now precarious. She also would like to improve the structure of their house.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables in order to provide a greater variety in her business.

loans.name: Washington

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Washington; el tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el es propietario de un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio también tiene un negocio de venta de comida que lo realiza su esposa, el negocio de servicio de taxi lo realiza desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi y también mejorar el negocio de venta de comida. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro y también para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, azúcar, carne y verduras para el negocio de venta de comida. 
                                              
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
He is a member of the Santo Domingo Communal Bank, which is located in the district of Cusco, a part of the province and department of Cusco.

This is Mr. Washington, who is 36 years old and lives with his partner and 3 children. This member alternates between providing transportation services--he owns a car in which he provides taxi services--and he owns a food business that his wife runs. He works as a cab driver from 6:00 am until 9:00 pm. With these two businesses, he is able to help his children get ahead. This member wishes to improve both his taxi service and his food business. He is requesting a loan for car maintenance and to purchase cooking ingredients like rice, sugar, meat, and vegetables for his food business.

Mr. Washington is happy about the loan, and he commits to making his payments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to give his car maintenance and to purchase cooking products like rice, sugar, meat, and vegetables for his food business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Paco Angel

texts.en:
Angel lives and works in the Santo Domingo canton of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas. Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is one of the largest cities in Ecuador, with 500,000 inhabitants. But you'd never guess the size of the city from the tranquil pace of life in the city. Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is in a tropical, humid area of Ecuador, renowned for its natural beauty, its huge markets, and its trade in livestock – the largest in the country.

Angel is 34 years old. He lives with his two children, aged five and 11 years old, who are both in school. Angel's life has been somewhat of a struggle, particularly when his parents both fell ill. He spends all of his free time with his children.

Angel has a candy shop where he sells chocolates, candies, posters and some jewelry. He works 11 hours a day without help from anyone. His biggest challenge in his work is making sales. He started this work after learning from his relatives.

This is Angel's second loan with Fundación Alternativa and his first loan with Kiva. Angel will use the loan to buy new kinds of inventory for the stall. 

Angel's dreams for the future are to see his two children grow up to be professionals and to marry.

loans.use: to buy chocolates, candies and other goods for a candy shop.

loans.name: Juana Iris

texts.es:
Juana, vive con su esposo y una hija, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa, él es empleado, tiene dos años D. estar en el negocio, ya cuenta con clientes frecuentes y este es un negocio D. familia.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra D. ropa, invirtiendo en blusas D. vestir, camisas, pantalones, el préstamo le ayudara para incrementar la mercadería y poder generar mejores ganancias para su familia.
Ella quiere mantenerse como comerciante y desarrollarse en el mercado, siendo cada día más rentable y contribuyendo a  la superación D. su familia.
texts.en:
Juana lives with her husband and daughter. She sells clothing for a living, while her husband is employed. She has been in business for two years, and she has regular customers in her family business.

She needs a loan in order to purchase clothing, investing in blouses, shirts, and pants. The loan will help her increase her merchandise and generate better profits for her family.

She wishes to continue as a vendor and to develop her business, becoming more lucrative each day and contributing to her family's self-improvement.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, shirts, and pants for her business.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Judith; ella tiene 34 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de jugos, ella vende en el mercado de la ciudad de cusco, la socia también tiene un carro que alquila y hace servicio de taxi, la socia trabaja en el negocio de venta de jugos desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de jugos y negocio de transporte, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de jugos y negocio de servicio de taxi. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro para comprar repuestos y llantas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "SANTO DOMINGO".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.
